member.summary: Gets the additional data fields that could be submitted while uploading the file. It returns dictionary which has as a key - the name of the submitted data field and as a value - the value of the data field If the browser supports HTML5 file API - like latest versions of Chrome, Mozilla FF, IE - data fields(like username) are added to the FormData object which is sent to the server via XMLHttpRequest object If the browser does NOT support HTML5 file API - like older versions of IE - IE10 and earlier - then these values are added as hidden fields to the form(that contains uploading file and is submitted to the server) These fields are inside the header of the http request

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeErrorCorrectionLevel
member.summary: QRCodeErrorCorrectionLevel defines the four level of Reed-Solomon error correction for the QR Code symbol.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeErrorCorrectionLevel.Low
member.summary: Low error correction level allows recovery of 7% of the symbol codewords.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeErrorCorrectionLevel.Medium
member.summary: Medium error correction level allows recovery of 15% of the symbol codewords.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeErrorCorrectionLevel.Quartil
member.summary: Quartil error correction level allows recovery of 25% of the symbol codewords.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeErrorCorrectionLevel.High
member.summary: High error correction level allows recovery of 30% of the symbol codewords.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode
member.summary: Specifies the encoding mode for compacting the data for the QR Code symbol. The modes are based on the character values and assignments associated with the default ECI (ECI 000003 representing the ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode.Undefined
member.summary: When Undefined encoding mode is set, the QR code barcode internally switches between modes as necessary in order to achieve the most efficient conversion of data into a binary string.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode.Numeric
member.summary: Numeric mode encodes data from decimal digit set (0-9). Normally 3 data characters are represented by 10 bits.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode.Alphanumeric
member.summary: Alphanumerc mode encodes data from a set of 45 characters (digits 0-9, upper case letters A-Z, nine other characters: space, $ % * + _ . / : ). Normally two input characters are represented by 11 bits.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode.Byte
member.summary: In Byte mode the data is encoded at 8 bits per character. The character set of the Byte encoding mode is byte data (by default it is ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode.Kanji
member.summary: The Kanji mode efficiently encodes Kanji characters in accordance with the Shift JIS system based on JIS X 0208. Each two-byte character value is compactedd to a 13-bit binary codeword.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Fnc1Mode
member.summary: Fnc1Mode indicator is used for messages containing specific data formats. Fnc1Mode applies to the entire symbol and is not affected by subsequent mode indicators.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Fnc1Mode.None
member.summary: Do not use any Fnc1 symbols, i.e. the data is not identified according to specific predefined industry or application specifications.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Fnc1Mode.Gs1
member.summary: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the first position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordance with the GS1 General Specification.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Fnc1Mode.Industry
member.summary: Uses Fnc1 symbol in the second position of the character in Code 128 symbols and designates data formatted in accordane with a specific indystry application previously agreed with AIM Inc.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Stretch
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that describes how an Image should be stretched to fill the destination rectangle.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Stretch.None
member.summary: The content preserves its original size.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Stretch.Fill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions. The aspect ratio is not preserved.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Stretch.Uniform
member.summary: The content is resized to fit in the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Stretch.UniformToFill
member.summary: The content is resized to fill the destination dimensions while it preserves its native aspect ratio. If the aspect ratio of the destination rectangle differs from the source, the source content is clipped to fit in the destination dimensions.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.BarcodeClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by the barcode

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.BarcodeClientEvents.ErrorMessageDisplaying
member.summary:
Event which is raised when an error has happened.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to barcode widget.
Use ui.errorMessage to obtain the error message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.BarcodeClientEvents.DataChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised when the data has changed.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to barcode widget.
Use ui.newData to obtain the new data.

member.summary: Sets the error correction level of the QR Code symbol.

member.summary: Sets the size version of the QR Code symbol.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcode`1.EncodingMode(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EncodingMode)
member.summary: Sets the encoding mode for compaction of the QR Code symbol data. The default value is undefined if the Shift_JIS encoding is loaded. Otherwise the default value is byte.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcode`1.EciNumber(System.Int32)
member.summary: Each Extended Channel Interpretation (ECI) is designated by a six-digit assignment number: 000000 - 999999. The default value depends on the loaded encodings. The default is ECI 000003 (representing ISO/IEC 8859-1) if the ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set is loaded. Otherwise the default value is 000026 (representing UTF-8).

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcode`1.EciHeaderDisplayMode(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HeaderDisplayMode)
member.summary: Sets a value indicating whether to show the ECI header.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcode`1.Fnc1Mode(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.Fnc1Mode)
member.summary: Sets the FNC1 mode indicator which identifies symbols encoding messages formatted according to specific predefined industry or application specificatoins.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcode`1.ApplicationIndicator(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the Application Indicator assigned to identify the specification concerned by AIM International. The value is respected only when the Fnc1Mode is set to Industry. Its value may take the form of any single Latin alphabetic character from the set {a - z, A - Z} or a two-digit number.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelBase
member.summary: A base class for all options models that provides easy serialization to JSON. The supported property types are string, int, bool, double, ModelBase(other models) or an IEnumerable of those.
member.remarks: Note that nulls, the empty object {}, the empty array [] or any other values that cannot be serialized are omitted.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IModel
member.summary: Interface for all helper models

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IModel.ToJson
member.remarks: Return null if the model is empty and must not be included in its parent json.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelBase.JsonFromObject(System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes an arbitrary object in json using the typed serialization methods.
member.remarks: Returns null for unrecognized object types.
member.param: The object which is to be serialized.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelBase.JsonFromString(System.String)
member.summary: Serializes a string object into json string, escaping all single quotes.
member.param: The string which is to be serialized.

member.summary: Serializes a bool object into json.
member.param: The bool which is to be serialized.

member.summary: Serializes an int object into json.
member.param: The int which is to be serialized.

member.summary: Serializes a double object into json.
member.param: The double which is to be serialized.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelBase.JsonFromDateTime(System.DateTime)
member.summary: Serializes a DateTime object into json Date object.
member.param: The DateTime which is to be serialized.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelBase.JsonFromIEnumerable(System.Collections.IEnumerable)
member.summary: Serializes an IEnumerable object into json.
member.remarks: All objects in the IEnumerable are recursively serialized to json using the JsonFromObject method.
member.param: The IEnumerable object which is to be serialized.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcodeModel.EncodingMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoding mode for compaction of the QR Code symbol data. The default value is undefined if the Shift_JIS encoding is loaded. Otherwise the default value is byte.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcodeModel.EciNumber
member.summary: Each Extended Channel Interpretation (ECI) is designated by a six-digit assignment number: 000000 - 999999. The default value depends on the loaded encodings. The default is ECI 000003 (representing ISO/IEC 8859-1) if the ISO/IEC 8859-1 character set is loaded. Otherwise the default value is 000026 (representing UTF-8).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcodeModel.EciHeaderDisplayMode
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the ECI header.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcodeModel.Fnc1Mode
member.summary: Gets or sets the FNC1 mode indicator which identifies symbols encoding messages formatted according to specific predefined industry or application specificatoins.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.QRCodeBarcodeModel.ApplicationIndicator
member.summary: Gets or sets the Application Indicator assigned to identify the specification concerned by AIM International. The value is respected only when the Fnc1Mode is set to Industry. Its value may take the form of any single Latin alphabetic character from the set {a - z, A - Z} or a two-digit number.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.BulletGraphClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by BulletGraph (igBulletGraph widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.BulletGraphClientEvents.FormatLabel
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a label of the bullet graph is formatted.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to bullet graph widget.
Use ui.actualMinimumValue to obtain the mimimum value of bullet graph scale.
Use ui.actualMaximumValue to obtain the maximum value of bullet graph scale.
Use ui.value to obtain the value on the bullet graph scale associated with the label.
Use ui.label to obtain the string value of the label.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.BulletGraphClientEvents.AlignLabel
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a label of the bullet graph is aligned along the scale.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to bullet graph widget.
Use ui.actualMinimumValue to obtain the mimimum value of bullet graph scale.
Use ui.actualMaximumValue to obtain the maximum value of bullet graph scale.
Use ui.value to obtain the value on the bullet graph scale associated with the label.
Use ui.label to obtain the string value of the label. Use ui.width to obtain the width of the label.
Use ui.height to obtain the height of the label.
Use ui.offsetX to obtain the X offset of the label on the bullet graph scale.
Use ui.offsetY to obtain the Y offset of the label on the bullet graph scale.

member.summary: Build value for event: ensure that function and its content is defined.
member.param: Value defined in KeyValuePair of ClientEvents Dictionary

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ModelWidgetBase.ClientEvents
member.summary:
Set implementations of client events raised by a widget.
Event handler assumes 2 parameters: 1st parameter has name "evt" and 2nd parameter has name "ui". To get information about member variables available for "ui" parameter, please consult documentation of a widget and its events.
Examples:
1. Full implementation:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "function(evt,ui){alert('drop:'+ui.owner);}" } }
2. Content of inline function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "alert('drop:'+ui.owner);" } }
3. Name of global function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "nameOfGlobalFunction" } } Note:
Instead of explicit key-strings, which represent name of event exposed by a widget, the event-constants defined by a particular control can be used.
Example:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpening, "nameOfGlobalFunction" } }

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GeographicShapeSeriesBase`3.ShapeMemberPath(System.String)
member.summary: The name of the property on ItemsSource items which, for each shape, contains a list of points to be converted to a polygon.
member.remarks: To be consistent with the Shapefile technical description, it is expected that each list of points is defined as an IEnumerable of IEnumerable of Point, or in other words, a list of lists of points.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GeographicShapeSeriesBase`3.ShapeFilterResolution(System.Double)
member.summary: The resolution at which to filter out shapes in the series. For example, if the ShapeFilterResolution is set to 3, then elements with a bounding rectangle smaller than 3 X 3 pixels will be filtered out.
member.remarks: In the case of PolylineSeries, the resolution is compared to either dimension, rather than both. In other words, a polyline will not be filtered if its height or its width exceeds the value of this property. Whereas with a ShapeSeries, both the height and the width must exceed the value of this property.

member.summary: The name of the property on ItemsSource items which, for each shape, contains a list of points to be converted to a polygon.
member.remarks: To be consistent with the Shapefile technical description, it is expected that each list of points is defined as an IEnumerable of IEnumerable of Point, or in other words, a list of lists of points.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ShapeSeriesBase`3.ShapeFilterResolution(System.Double)
member.summary: The resolution at which to filter out shapes in the series. For example, if the ShapeFilterResolution is set to 3, then elements with a bounding rectangle smaller than 3 X 3 pixels will be filtered out.
member.remarks: In the case of PolylineSeries, the resolution is compared to either dimension, rather than both. In other words, a polyline will not be filtered if its height or its width exceeds the value of this property. Whereas with a ShapeSeries, both the height and the width must exceed the value of this property.

member.summary: The response to user panning and zooming: whether to update the view immediately while the user action is happening, or to defer the update to after the user action is complete. The user action will be an action such as a mouse drag which causes panning and/or zooming to occur.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SeriesViewerModel.WindowRectMinWidth
member.summary: Sets or gets the minimum width that the window rect is allowed to reach before being clamped. Decrease this value if you want to allow for further zooming into the viewer. If this value is lowered too much it can cause graphical corruption due to floating point arithmetic inaccuracy.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LegendClientEvents.LegendItemMouseLeftButtonDown
member.summary:
Occurs when the left mouse button is pressed while the mouse pointer is over an element of this legend.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.legend to get reference to current legend object.
Use ui.chart to get reference to chart owner object.
Use ui.series to get reference to current series owner object.
Use ui.actualItemBrush to get legend item brush.Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series owner brush.
Use ui.item to get reference to chart item related to event.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LegendClientEvents.LegendItemMouseLeftButtonUp
member.summary:
Occurs when the left mouse button is released while the mouse pointer is over an element of this legend.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.legend to get reference to current legend object.
Use ui.chart to get reference to chart owner object.
Use ui.series to get reference to current series owner object.
Use ui.actualItemBrush to get legend item brush.Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series owner brush.
Use ui.item to get reference to chart item related to event.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Combo (igCombo widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.Rendered
member.summary: Event which is raised after rendering of the combo completes. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the combo performing rendering. Use ui.element to get a reference to the main/top combo element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource used by combo.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary: Event which is raised after data binding is complete. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo performing the data binding. Use ui.dataView to get a reference to the data igCombo is databound to. Use ui.success to see if the databinding was performed correctly. Use ui.errorMessage to get the error message if the databinding failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.Filtering
member.summary: Event which is raised before data filtering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.expression to obtain reference to array which contains expressions supported by $.ig.DataSource. Each expression-item contains following members: fieldName (textKey), cond (filteringCondition), expr (value/string to filter).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.Filtered
member.summary: Event which is raised after filtering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.expression to obtain reference to array which contains expressions supported by $.ig.DataSource. Each expression-item contains following members: fieldName (textKey), cond (filteringCondition), expr (value/string to filter).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.ItemsRendering
member.summary: Event which is raised before rendering of the combo items is performed. Function takes arguments evt and ui.Use ui.owner to get a reference to the combo performing rendering.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.ItemsRendered
member.summary: Event which is raised after rendering of the combo items completes. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the combo performing rendering. Use ui.items to get a reference to the items rendered.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpening
member.summary: Event which is raised before drop-down list is opened. Return false in order to cancel drop-down action. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpened
member.summary: Event which is raised after drop-down list was opened. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownClosing
member.summary: Event which is raised before drop-down list is closed. Return false in order to cancel hide action. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.DropDownClosed
member.summary: Event which is raised after drop-down list was closed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery DOM element which represents container of list.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.SelectionChanging
member.summary: Event which is raised before selection change. Return false in order to cancel change. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.items to obtain reference to array of new selected items. That can be null. Use ui.oldItems to obtain reference to array of old selected items. That can be null.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboClientEvents.SelectionChanged
member.summary: Event which is raised after selection change. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser. That can be null. Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igCombo. Use ui.items to obtain reference to array of new selected items. That can be null. Use ui.oldItems to obtain reference to array of old selected items. That can be null.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: this is an attribute class which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of the controller method that should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). The idea of this filter is to transform the ActionResult into a JsonResult instance, taking into account filtering Request params. Since MVC doesn't have ViewState, we will need to infer all the features from the request itself, that's the only information we have regarding any previous state.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: intercepts the controller call, and transforms the action result into a json result.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.OnActionExecuting(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutingContext)
member.summary: implementation of the ActionExecuting event

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboDataSourceActionAttribute.BuildPredicate(System.Collections.Generic.List{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FilterExpression})
member.summary: converts a list of filtering expressions into a LINQ predicate

member.summary: That method refreshes the value of data source passed to the client.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

remarks.p: Dictionary of attributes passed to TagBuilder.MergeAttributes(value).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSource
member.summary: Gets sets a valid data source accepted by $.ig.DataSource, or an instance of an $.ig.DataSource itself.

remarks.p: If it is set to string and "dataSourceType" option is not set, then $.ig.JSONPDataSource is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedIndexes
member.summary: Set gets indexes of selected items in list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectedValues
member.summary: Set gets selected items in list.

remarks.p: Note: If value is set, then SelectedIndexes is set to null.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Width
member.summary: Gets sets width of combo.

remarks.p: The numeric and string values (valid html units for size) are supported. It includes %, px, em and other units.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Height
member.summary: Gets sets height of combo.

remarks.p: The numeric and string values (valid html units for size) are supported. It includes %, px, em and other units.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSourceType
member.summary: Gets sets data source type (such as "json", "xml", etc). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DataSourceUrl
member.summary: Gets sets url which is used for sending JSON on request for remote filtering (MVC for example). That option is required when load on demand is enabled and its type is remote.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseTotalRecCountKey
member.summary: Sets property in the response specifying the total number of records on the server.

remarks.p: see $.ig.DataSource. property in the response specifying the total number of records on the server.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseDataKey
member.summary: Sets the name of record which holds the list of data rows in response-JSON object and when CompactData is disabled.

remarks.p: Default value is set to "Records". It means that rows of items should belong to the Records object.
For more information, consult documentation for javascript of $.ig.DataSource.
This is basically the property in the responses where data records are held, if the response is wrapped.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ResponseContentType
member.summary: Content type of the response.

remarks.p: See http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax/ => contentType.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.RequestType
member.summary: Specifies the HTTP verb to be used to issue the request

remarks.p: Default value is set to 'GET'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ValueKey
member.summary: Gets sets name of column which contains the "value".

remarks.p: If it is missing, then name of first column will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.TextKey
member.summary: Gets sets name of column which contains the displayed text.

remarks.p: If it is missing, then "valueKey" option will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets sets template used to render an item in list.

remarks.p:
Notes:
1. The jquery.tmpl.js of Microsoft is used and application should provide supported syntax for content. 2. Template is rendered inside of LI html element. So, application should consider restriction for layout: do not use "block" html elements and in case of absolutely positioned elements, they should not overlap with checkbox icons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets sets template used to render header in drop-down list.

remarks.p: The template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Gets sets template used to render footer in drop-down list.

remarks.p: The template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.InputName
member.summary: Gets sets name of the hidden INPUT element, which is used when submiting data. Its value will be set to values of selected items valueKeys separated by "," character on any change in igCombo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.NoMatchFoundText
member.summary: Gets sets text of list item for condition when "filteringType" option is enabled and no match was found. That is an override for the $.ig.Combo.locale.noMatchFoundText.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.PlaceHolder
member.summary: Gets sets value that is displayed when input field is empty. Default value is 'select...'.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the Combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.UseExistingElement
member.summary: Sets the ID of the Combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string that is used to format the text display values in the combo. Valid options are: "auto" (default) - uses automatic formatting for Date and number objects. "none", "", or null - will disable formatting Custom values can be something like "currency", "percent", "dateLong", "time", "MMM-dd-yyyy H:mm tt", etc. Custom format strings should match the data type in "textKey" column.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilterExprUrlKey
member.summary: Gets sets url key name that specifies how the remote filtering expressions will be encoded for remote requests, e.g. '&filter('col') = startsWith.' Default is OData

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownButtonTitle
member.summary: Gets sets title for html element which represend drop-down button. That is an override for the $.ig.Combo.locale.dropDownButtonTitle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.ClearButtonTitle
member.summary: Gets sets title for html element which represend clear button. That is an override for the $.ig.Combo.locale.clearButtonTitle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownAttachedToBody
member.summary: Gets sets ability to append container of drop-down list to the body or to the parent of combo.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Virtualization
member.summary: Gets sets ability to use virtual rendering for drop-down list. If that option is enabled, then only visible items are created and top edge of first visible item in list is aligned to the top edge of list.

remarks.p: Default value is 'false'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Gets sets whether filtering and auto selection should be case sensitive.

remarks.p: Default value is 'false'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.AutoSelectFirstMatch
member.summary: Gets sets whether the first matching item should be auto selected when typing in input.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CloseDropDownOnBlur
member.summary: Gets sets ability to close drop-down list when control loses focus.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownOnFocus
member.summary: Gets sets ability to show drop down list when combo gets focus. This option has effect only if mode is 'editable'

remarks.p: Default value is 'false'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.CloseDropDownOnSelect
member.summary: Gets sets ability to close drop down list when single item in the list is selected with mouse click or enter press. The default value when multi selection is enabled will be false. This option will not close the drop down when multiple selection is enabled and selection with ctrl or shift is performed.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.SelectItemBySpaceKey
member.summary: Gets sets ability to select items by space button press

remarks.p: Default value is 'false'

member.summary: Set option to pass to client only data with ValueKey and TextKey columns.

remarks.p: That property has effect only when DataSource is IQueryable

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.PreventSubmitOnEnter
member.summary: Gets sets ability to prevent form submitting on enter key press

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.summary: Specifies whether the clear button should be rendered

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringType
member.summary: Gets sets type of filtering.

remarks.p:
Notes:
If this option is set to "remote", then the "css.waitFiltering" is applied to combo and its drop-down list. remote type="string" filtering is performed by server. local type="string" filtering is performed by $.ig.DataSource. none type="string" filtering is disabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringCondition
member.summary: Gets sets condition used for filtering. type="contains|doesNotContain|startsWith|endsWith|greaterThan|lessThan|greaterThanOrEqualTo|lessThanOrEqualTo|equals|doesNotEqual

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.FilteringLogic
member.summary: Gets sets filtering logic. type="OR|AND"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.Mode
member.summary: Sets gets functionality mode. editable type="string" Allows to modify value by edit field and drop-down list. dropdown type="string" Allows to modify value by drop-down list only. readonlylist type="string" Allows to open list, but does not allow any changes in field or selection in drop-down list. If selection is not set, then first item in dataSource is automatically selected. readonly type="string" Does not allow to open list or change value in field. If selection is not set, then first item in dataSource is automatically selected.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.HighlightMatchesMode
member.summary: Gets sets condition used for highlighting of matching parts in items of drop-down list. multi type="string" multiple matches in a single item are rendered. contains type="string" match at any position in item is rendered. startsWith type="string" only match which starts from the beginning of text is rendered. full type="string" only fully matched items are rendered. null type="object" matches are not rendered.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.DropDownOrientation
member.summary: Gets sets drop down opening orientation for the dorp down list when open button is clicked 'auto' type="string" Calculate orientation depending on combo position 'top' type="string" Top orientation 'bottom' type="string" Bottom orientation

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ComboModel.MultiSelectionSettings
member.summary: Gets sets object specifying multi selection feature options. The object has following properties enabled, addWithKeyModifier, showCheckboxes and itemSeparator. Set enabled to true to turn multi selection on. Set addWithKeyModifier to true to disable the additive selection, then additive selection can be done by ctrl + mouse click / enter. Set showCheckboxes to true to render check boxes in front of each drop down item. Use itemSeparator to set what string to be rendered between items in field. Note showCheckboxes and itemSeparator has effect only if multi selection is enabled.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Dialog (igDialog widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogClientEvents.StateChanging
member.summary:
Event which is raised before state of dialog was changed.
Return false in order to cancel action.
Function takes arguments "evt" and "ui".
Use evt to obtain browser event. That parameter can be null if state was modified from codes.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igDialog.
Use ui.button to obtain name of button, which triggered event. Note: if state was modified from codes, then "button" is undefined.
Use ui.oldState to obtain old state of dialog, which can be one of following: "opened", "minimized", "maximized", "closed".
Use ui.oldPinned to obtain boolean value of old pin state of dialog.
Use ui.action to obtain name of action. That can be one of the following:
"open" - request to open dialog
"close" - request to close dialog
"minimize" - request to minimize dialog
"maximize" - request to maximize dialog
"restore" - request to restore dialog from minimized or maximized state
"pin" - request to pin dialog
"unpin" - request to unpin dialog

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogClientEvents.StateChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after state of dialog was changed.
Function takes arguments "evt" and "ui".
Use evt to obtain browser event. That parameter can be null if state was modified from codes.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igDialog.
Use ui.button to obtain name of button, which triggered event. Note: if state was modified from codes, then "button" is undefined.
Use ui.oldState to obtain old state of dialog, which can be one of following: "opened", "minimized", "maximized", "closed".
Use ui.oldPinned to obtain boolean value of old pin state of dialog.
Use ui.action to obtain name of action. That can be one of the following:
"open" - dialog was opened. Note: event is raised before possible "openAnimation" started.
"close" - dialog was closed. Note: event is raised before possible "closeAnimation" started.
"minimize" - dialog was minimized
"maximize" - dialog was maximized
"restore" - dialog was restored from minimized or maximized state
"pin" - dialog was pinned
"unpin" - dialog was unpinned

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogClientEvents.AnimationEnded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after end animation when dialod was closed or opened.
Function takes arguments "evt" and "ui".
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igDialog.
Use ui.action to obtain name of action, which triggered animation.
"open" - dialog was opened
"close" - dialog was closed

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogClientEvents.Focus
member.summary:
Event which is raised when dialog or its content gets focus.
Function takes arguments "evt" and "ui".
Use evt to obtain browser event.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igDialog.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogClientEvents.Blur
member.summary:
Event which is raised when dialog or its content loses focus.
Function takes arguments "evt" and "ui".
Use evt to obtain browser event.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to igDialog.

member.summary: Sets initial position of dialog. That is a wrapper for Position("[" + left + "," + top + "]").
member.param: Left position of dialog in pixels
Top position of dialog in pixels

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogModel.ID
member.summary:
Sets the ID of the dialog.
Note: that property has no effect if ContentJquerySelector or ContentID is set.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogModel.ContentJquerySelector
member.summary:
Sets the jquery selector which is used as content for the dialog.
Notes:
1. The content of dialog is built by $(value).
2. The ContentHTML and ContentID have priority over that property. 3. The ID property is not used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogModel.ContentID
member.summary:
Sets the ID of html element which is used as content for the dialog.
Notes:
1. The content of dialog is built by $("#" + value).
2. That property has priority over ContentJquerySelector.
3. The ContentHTML has priority over that property.
4. The ID property is not used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DialogModel.ContentHTML
member.summary:
Sets the HTML which is used as content for the dialog. Notes: 1. The content of dialog is built by $("
" + value + "
"). 2. That property has priority over possible ContentID and ContentJquerySelector. 3. The single quote character is not supported within html. The double quote should be used instead.

member.summary:

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DoughnutChartClientEvents.TooltipShowing
member.summary: Event fired when the mouse has hovered on a series and the tooltip is about to show. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element. Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object. Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object. Use ui.series to get reference to current series object. Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush. Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DoughnutChartClientEvents.TooltipShown
member.summary: Event fired after a tooltip is shown. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element. Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object. Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object. Use ui.series to get reference to current series object. Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush. Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DoughnutChartClientEvents.TooltipHiding
member.summary: Event fired when the mouse has left a series and the tooltip is about to hide. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get reference to tooltip DOM element. Use ui.item to get reference to current series item object. Use ui.chart to get reference to chart object. Use ui.series to get reference to current series object. Use ui.actualItemBrush to get item brush. Use ui.actualSeriesBrush to get series brush.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.KeyDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised on keydown event.
Return false in order to cancel key action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.key to obtain value of keyCode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.KeyPress
member.summary:
Event which is raised on keypress event.
Return false in order to cancel key action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.key to obtain value of keyCode.
Set ui.key to another character which will replace original entry.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.KeyUp
member.summary:
Event which is raised on keyup event.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.key to obtain value of keyCode.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mousedown at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseUp
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mouseup at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseMove
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mousemove at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseOver
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mouseover at any part of editor including drop-down list.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.elementType to obtain type of html element under mouse, such as field, button, spinUpper, spinLower or item#.
Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.MouseLeave
member.summary:
Event which is raised on mouseleave at any part of editor including drop-down list.

Use ui.id and ui.elementType to obtain flag which represents html element under mouse.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.Focus
member.summary:
Event which is raised when input field of editor gets focus.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.Blur
member.summary:
Event which is raised when input field of editor loses focus.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ValueChanging
member.summary:
Event which is raised before value in editor was changed.
Return false in order to cancel change.
It can be raised on lost focus or on spin events.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to obtain new value and ui.oldValue to obtain old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ValueChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after value in editor was changed. It can be raised on lost focus or on spin events.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to obtain new value and ui.oldValue to obtain old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.TextChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised after text in editor was changed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to obtain new value and ui.oldValue to obtain old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.InvalidValue
F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.Spin
member.summary:
Event which is raised on spin event.
Return false in order to cancel spin.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.delta to obtain delta for increment or decrement.
Use ui.value to obtain the "value" of editor before spin action.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ButtonClick
member.summary:
Event which is raised when button was clicked by mouse.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ShowDropDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised before drop-down list or calendar is opened.
Return false in order to cancel drop-down action.
Function takes argument evt.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.HideDropDown
member.summary:
Event which is raised before drop-down list or calendar is opened.
Function takes argument evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.value to obtain reference to the selected item in list or Date in calendar.
If ui.value is not null and not undefined, that it means that drop-down was closed due to selection from drop-down list or from calendar.
Otherwise, drop-down was closed due to lost focus or Esc key press.
Return false in order to cancel hide action and keep drop-down visible.
It is not recommended to cancel that action on blur event.
Note: In case of calendar of datepicker, the evt or evt.originalEvent can be null. That happens if calendar was closed on blur or by Esc key.
Returning the false in this situation will not prevent closing drop-down calendar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ListSelecting
member.summary:
Event which is raised before list item is selected.
Return false in order to cancel select action.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.index to get new selected index.
Use ui.oldIndex to get old selected index.
Use ui.item to get reference to new selected item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.EditorClientEvents.ListSelected
member.summary:
Event which is raised after list item was selected.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use evt.originalEvent to obtain reference to event of browser.
Use ui.index to get new selected index.
Use ui.oldIndex to get old selected index.
Use ui.item to get reference to new selected item.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: This is an attribute class, which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of a controller's method, which should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). If that attribute is used for FunnelChart or Sparkline, then only fields used by those charts are passed to client. Otherwise, all data are passed to client: similar to Controller.Json(data)

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Combo (igCombo widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before data binding.
Return false in order to cancel data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary:
Event which is raised after data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.data to obtain reference to array actual data which is displayed by chart.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartClientEvents.UpdateTooltip
member.summary:
Event which is raised before tooltip is updated.
Return false in order to cancel updating and hide tooltip.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.text to obtain html of tooltip. Value of that member can be modified. If modified value is null or empty string, then current content of tooltip keeps old value.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to item. Value of that member can be modified or replaced by custom item.
Use ui.x to obtain left position of tooltip in pixels relative to widget. Value of that member can be modified.
Use ui.y to obtain top position of tooltip in pixels relative to widget. Value of that member can be modified.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery object which represents tooltip. Value of that member can be replaced by custom element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartClientEvents.HideTooltip
member.summary:
Event which is raised before tooltip is hidden.
Return false in order to cancel hiding and keep tooltip visible.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to item.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery object which represents tooltip or value of ui.element from last updateTooltip event. Value of that member can be replaced by custom element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartClientEvents.SliceClicked
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a slice is clicked.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.index to obtain index of clicked slice.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to clicked slice item.
Use ui.selected to check if slice became selected.

member.summary: Model containing the options for the igFunnelChart widget
class describing funnel chart object.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the igFunnelChart Model class.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.GetDataMemberPaths
member.summary: Gets list which contains ValueMemberPath, InnerLabelMemberPath and OuterLabelMemberPath if those properties are defined.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.BezierPoints
member.summary:
Gets or sets values for upper and lower bezier points. That option has effect only when useBezierCurve is enabled.
Value should provide 4 numeric values in range from 0 to 1 separated by space character. The first number defines upper-x position, second: upper-y, third: lower-x, fourth: lower-y.
Internal default is "0.5 0 0.5 1".
Example: bezierPoints: "0.4 0.1 0.6 1"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.SelectedSliceStyle
member.summary:
Gets or sets style which is applied to selected slices.
Note: the Thickness member of ShapeStyleModel is not supported. Please use OutlineThickness.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.UnselectedSliceStyle
member.summary:
Gets or sets style which is applied to unselected slices.
Note: the Thickness member of ShapeStyleModel is not supported. Please use OutlineThickness.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.Legend
member.summary: Gets sets the chart legend

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.FormatInnerLabel
member.summary:
Gets sets javascript function which formats inner labels.
Function should return string and it takes 3 parameters: 1st-value of item to format, 2nd-index of item within data, 3rd-reference to igFunnelChart.
Example:
"function(val, i, chart) { return 'Value=' + chart.getDataItem(i).Value; }"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FunnelChartModel.FormatOuterLabel
member.summary:
Gets sets javascript function which formats outer labels.
Function should return string and it takes 3 parameters: 1st-value of item to format, 2nd-index of item within data, 3rd-reference to igFunnelChart.
Example:
"function(val, i, chart) { return '$' + val + ', ID=' + chart.getDataItem(i).ID; }"

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialGaugeClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by RadialGauge (igRadialGauge widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialGaugeClientEvents.FormatLabel
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a label of the gauge is formatted.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to gauge widget.
Use ui.actualMinimumValue to obtain the mimimum value of gauge scale.
Use ui.actualMaximumValue to obtain the maximum value of gauge scale.
Use ui.startAngle to obtain the starting angle of gauge scale. Use ui.endAngle to obtain the ending angle of gauge scale.
Use ui.angle to obtain the angle on the gauge scale at which the label will be located.
Use ui.value to obtain the value on the gauge scale associated with the label.
Use ui.label to obtain the string value of the label.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RadialGaugeClientEvents.AlignLabel
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a label of the gauge is aligned along the scale.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to gauge widget.
Use ui.actualMinimumValue to obtain the mimimum value of gauge scale.
Use ui.actualMaximumValue to obtain the maximum value of gauge scale.
Use ui.startAngle to obtain the starting angle of gauge scale. Use ui.endAngle to obtain the ending angle of gauge scale.
Use ui.angle to obtain the angle on the gauge scale at which the label will be located.
Use ui.value to obtain the value on the gauge scale associated with the label.
Use ui.label to obtain the string value of the label. Use ui.width to obtain the width of the label.
Use ui.height to obtain the height of the label.
Use ui.offsetX to obtain the X offset of the label on the gauge scale.
Use ui.offsetY to obtain the Y offset of the label on the gauge scale.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridCellMergingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Cell Merging (igGridCellMerging widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridCellMergingClientEvents.CellsMerging
member.summary: Event fired before a new merged cells group is created. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridCellMerging. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igGridCellMerging are initialized for. Use ui.value to get the cells value which is repeated and caused the merged group to be created.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridCellMergingClientEvents.CellsMerged
member.summary: Event fired after a new merged cells group is created. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the merged group starts in. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridCellMerging. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igGridCellMerging are initialized for. Use ui.value to get the cells value which is repeated and caused the merged group to be created. Use ui.count to get the total count of cells that were merged.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFixingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Column Fixing (igGridColumnFixing widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFixingClientEvents.ColumnFixing
member.summary: Event which is fired when column fixing operation is initiated. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column to be fixed. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column to be fixed. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFixingClientEvents.ColumnFixed
member.summary: Event which is fired when column fixing operation is finished. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the fixed column. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the fixed column. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFixingClientEvents.ColumnUnfixing
member.summary: Event which is fired when column unfixing operation is initiated. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column to be unfixed. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column to be unfixed. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFixingClientEvents.ColumnUnfixed
member.summary: Event which is fired when column unfixing operation is done. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the unfixed column. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the unfixed column. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnFixingClientEvents.ColumnFixingRefused
member.summary: Event which is fired when column fixing operation is initiated but sum of the width of the fixed columns container and width of the column to be fixed exceeds the grid width. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column to be fixed. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column to be fixed. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Column Moving (igGridColumnMoving widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnDragStart
member.summary: Event which is fired when a drag operation begins on a column header. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column being dragged. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column being dragged. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget. Use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th being dragged. Use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that's actually being dragged.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnDragEnd
member.summary: Event which is fired when a drag operation ends on a column header. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget. Use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged. Use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnDragCanceled
member.summary: Event which is fired when a drag operation is canceled. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being dragged. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being dragged. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget. Use args.header to get a reference to the orginal th that was being dragged. Use args.helper to get a reference to cloned DOM element that was actually being dragged.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnMoving
member.summary: Event which is fired when a column moving operation is initiated. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was being moved. Use args.columnIndex to get the column index of the column that was being moved. Use args.targetIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.ColumnMoved
member.summary: Event which is fired when a column moving operation completes. Use args.columnKey to get the column key of the column that was moved. Use args.oldIndex to get the previous column index of the column that was moved. Use args.newIndex to get the new column index of the column that was being moved. Use args.owner to get a reference to the widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogOpening
member.summary: Event fired before the moving dialog is opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.summary: Event fired after the column chooser is already opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridColumnMoving widget. member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumnMovingClientEvents.MovingDialogDragged
member.summary: Event fired every time the moving dialog changes its position. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridMoving widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.movingDialogElement to get a reference to the moving dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the moving dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page. Use ui.position to get the current position of the moving dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

member.summary: Event fired when a cell is right clicked. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.cellElement to get reference to cell DOM element. Use ui.rowIndex to get row index. Use ui.colIndex to get column index. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.summary: Event fired before data binding takes place. Return false in order to cancel data binding. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.summary: Event fired after data binding is complete. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Rendering
member.summary: Event fired before the grid starts rendering (all contents). This event is fired only when the grid is being initialized. It will not be fired if the grid is rebound to its data (for example, when calling the dataBind() API method or when changing the page size (when paging is enabled)). Return false in order to cancel grid rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Rendered
member.summary: Event fired after the whole grid widget has been rendered (including headers, footers, etc.). This event is fired only when the grid is being initialized. It will not be fired if the grid is rebound to its data (for example, when calling the dataBind() API method or when changing the page size (when paging is enabled)). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.DataRendering
member.summary: Event fired before the TBODY holding the data records starts its rendering. Return false in order to cancel data records rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.DataRendered
member.summary: Event fired after all of the data records in the grid table body have been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.HeaderRendering
member.summary: Event fired before the header starts its rendering. Return false in order to cancel header rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.HeaderRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the header has been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.table to get reference to headers table DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.FooterRendering
member.summary: Event fired before the footer starts its rendering. Return false in order to cancel footer rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.FooterRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the footer has been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.table to get reference to footers table DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.HeaderCellRendered
member.summary: Event fired after every TH in the grid header has been rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.columnKey to get column key. Use ui.th to get reference to header cell DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.RowsRendering
member.summary: Event fired before actual data rows (TRs) are rendered. Return false in order to cancel rows rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.tbody to get reference to grid's table body.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.RowsRendered
member.summary: Event fired after data rows are rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.tbody to get reference to grid's table body.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.SchemaGenerated
member.summary: Event fired after $.ig.DataSource schema has been generated, in case it needs to be modified. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.schema to get reference to data source schema. Use ui.dataSource to get reference to data source.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.ColumnsCollectionModified
member.summary: Event fired after the columns colection has been modified(e.g. a column is hidden). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.RequestError
member.summary: Event fired if there is an error in the request, when the grid is doing a remote operation, such as data binding, paging, sorting, etc. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the grid. Use ui.message to get the error message coming from the server.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Created
member.summary: Fired when the grid is created and the initial structure is rendered (this doesn't necessarily imply the data will be there if the data source is remote). Use ui.owner to get a reference to the grid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridClientEvents.Destroyed
member.summary: Fired when the grid is destroyed. Use ui.owner to get a reference to the grid.

member.summary: If true, encodes all requests using OData conventions and the $expand syntax.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGrid`1.Rest(System.Boolean)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGrid`1.AggregateTransactions(System.Boolean)
member.summary: enables aggregation of transactions according to the following rules if a new row is added, and then deleted, there will be no transaction added to the log if a new role is added, edited, then deleted, there will be no transaction added to the log if several edits are made to a row or an individual cell, this should result in a single transaction

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGrid`1.AutoFormat(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridAutoFormat)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGrid`1.AutofitLastColumn(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If autofitLastColumn is true and all columns' widths are specified and their combined width is less than the grid width then the last column width will be automatically adjusted to fill the entire grid.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGrid`1.ClientEvents(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary:
Set implementations of client events raised by a widget.
Event handler assumes 2 parameters: 1st parameter has name "evt" and 2nd parameter has name "ui". To get information about member variables available for "ui" parameter, please consult documentation of a widget and its events.
Examples:
1. Full implementation:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "function(evt,ui){alert('drop:'+ui.owner);}" } }
2. Content of inline function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "alert('drop:'+ui.owner);" } }
3. Name of global function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "nameOfGlobalFunction" } } Note:
Instead of explicit key-strings, which represent name of event exposed by a widget, the event-constants defined by a particular control can be used.
Example:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpening, "nameOfGlobalFunction" } }

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.IGrid`1.AddClientEvent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds javascript function to process client event of widget.
member.param:
Name over available for widget.
It is recommended to use string constants available for a specific widget.
Examples: ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpened, DialogClientEvents.StateChanged, etc.
Name of javascript function which processes event, or content of function, or full implementation of function.

If enabled, the number of actual rendered rows (DOM elements) will be constant and related to the visible viewport of the grid. As the end user scrolls, those DOM elements will be dynamically reused to render the new data.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid GroupBy (igGridGroupBy widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.GroupedColumnsChanging
member.summary: Event which is fired when the grouped columns collection is about to change. This event is fired even when the OK button is clicked from the modal dialog (after the modalDialogButtonApplyClick event is fired). Use args.owner in order to access the groupby widget object. Use args.owner.grid to access the grid widget option. Use args.groupedColumns to get a reference to the current groupedColumns. Use args.newGroupedColumns to get an object of the new grouped columns that should be applied (it is set ONLY if called from modal dialog). Use args.key to get a reference to the current column's key that's being grouped (not set if called from modal dialog). Use args.layout to get a reference to the current layout object, if any (not set if called from modal dialog). Use args.grid to get a reference to the current child grid element, in case it's an hierarchical grid (not set if called from modal dialog).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.GroupedColumnsChanged
member.summary: event which is fired when the groupedColumns collection has changed. This event is fired also when group/ungroup from groupby modal dialog but key, layout and grid are not set. Use args.owner in order to access the groupby widget object. Use args.owner.grid to access the grid widget option. Use args.groupedColumns to get a reference to the current groupedColumns. Use args.key to get a reference to the current column's key that's being grouped. Use args.layout to get a reference to the current layout object, if any. Use args.grid to get a reference to the current child grid element, in case it's an hierarchical grid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridGroupByClientEvents.ModalDialogMoving
member.summary: Event fired every time the groupby dialog changes its position. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridGroupBy widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the Column Chooser element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the groupby dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page. Use ui.position to get the current position of the groupby dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Hierarchical Grid Framework (igHierarchicalGrid widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents.RowExpanding
member.summary: Event which is fired when a hierarchical row is about to be expanded. Return false in order to cancel row expanding. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to access the hierarchical grid object. Use ui.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be expanded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents.RowExpanded
member.summary: Event which is fired after a hierarchical row has been expanded. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to access the hierarchical grid object. Use ui.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was expanded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents.RowCollapsing
member.summary: Event which is fired when a hierarchical row is about to be collapsed. Return false in order to cancel row collapsing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to access the hierarchical grid object. Use ui.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be collapsed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents.RowCollapsed
member.summary: Event which is fired when a hierarchical row has been collapsed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to access the hierarchical grid object. Use ui.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was collapsed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents.ChildrenPopulating
member.summary: Event which is fired when children are about to be populated (Load on demand). Return false in order to cancel children populating. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to access the hierarchical grid object. Use ui.parentrow to access the row element for the row that's about to be populated. Use ui.id to get the data ID of the row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.HierarchicalGridClientEvents.ChildrenPopulated
member.summary: Event which is fired when children have been populated (Load on demand). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to access the hierarchical grid object. Use ui.parentrow to access the row element for the row that was populated. Use ui.id to get the data ID of the row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridAppendRowsOnDemandClientEvents.RowsRequested
member.summary: Event fired after the requested rows are returned from the remote endpoint, but before grid data rebinds. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridAppendRowsOnDemand. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.chunkIndex to get current chunk index. Use ui.chunkSize to get chunk size. Use ui.rows to get requested rows.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridPagingClientEvents.PageIndexChanging
member.summary: Event fired before the page index is changed. Return false in order to cancel page index changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.currentPageIndex to get current page index. Use ui.newPageIndex to get new page index.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridPagingClientEvents.PageIndexChanged
member.summary: Event fired after the page index is changed, but before grid data rebinds. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.pageIndex to get current page index.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridPagingClientEvents.PageSizeChanging
member.summary: Event fired when the page size is about to be changed from the page size dropdown. Return false in order to cancel page size changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.currentPageSize to get current page size. Use ui.newPageSize to get new page size.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridPagingClientEvents.PageSizeChanged
member.summary: Event fired after the page size is changed from the page size dropdown. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.pageSize to get current page size.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridPagingClientEvents.PagerRendering
member.summary: Event fired before the pager footer is rendered (the whole area below the grid records). Return false in order to cancel pager footer rendering. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridPagingClientEvents.PagerRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the pager footer is rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridPaging. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.dataSource to get reference to grid's data source.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResizingClientEvents.ColumnResizing
member.summary: Event fired before a resizing operation is executed. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResizing widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnIndex to get the resized column index. Use ui.columnKey to get the resized column key. Use ui.desiredWidth to get the desired width(before min/max coercion) for the resized column.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResizingClientEvents.ColumnResized
member.summary: Event fired after the resizing has been executed and results are rendered. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResizing widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnIndex to get the resized column index. Use ui.columnKey to get the resized column key. Use ui.originalWidth to get the original column width. Use ui.newWidth to get the final column width after resizing.
