member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResponsiveClientEvents.ResponsiveColumnHiding
member.summary: Event fired before a hiding operation is executed on a collection of columns. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResponsive widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnIndex to get the hidden column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number. Use ui.columnKey to get the hidden column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResponsiveClientEvents.responsiveColumnHidden
member.summary: Event fired after a hiding operation is executed on the collection of columns. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResponsive widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnIndex to get the hidden column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number. Use ui.columnKey to get the hidden column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResponsiveClientEvents.responsiveColumnShowing
member.summary: Event fired before a showing operation is executed on a collection of columns. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResponsive widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnIndex to get the shown column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number. Use ui.columnKey to get the shown column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResponsiveClientEvents.responsiveColumnShown
member.summary: Event fired after a showing operation is executed on the collection of columns. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResponsive widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnIndex to get the shown column index. Has a value only if the column's key is a number. Use ui.columnKey to get the shown column key. Has a value only if the column's key is a string.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridResponsiveClientEvents.responsiveModeChanged
member.summary: Event which is fired when the widget detects an environment change. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridResponsive widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.previousMode to get the previously assumed mode. Use ui.mode to get the newly assumed mode.

member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Row Selectors (igGridRowSelectors widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents.RowSelectorClicked
member.summary: Event fired after a row selector is clicked. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowSelector to get reference to the row selector cell. Use ui.owner to get reference to igRowSelectors. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igRowSelectors are initialized for.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents.CheckBoxStateChanging
member.summary: Event fired when a row selector checkbox is changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowSelector to get reference to the row selector cell. Use ui.owner to get reference to igRowSelectors. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igRowSelectors are initialized for. Use ui.currentState to get the current state of the checkbox ("on","off"). Use ui.newState to get the new state of the checkbox ("on","off"). Use ui.isHeader to check if the header check box is the one being clicked. In this case no row related args are passed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridRowSelectorsClientEvents.CheckBoxStateChanged
member.summary: Event fired after a row selector checkbox had changed state. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.row to get reference to the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowIndex to get the index of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowKey to get the key of the row the clicked row selector resides in. Use ui.rowSelector to get reference to the row selector cell. Use ui.owner to get reference to igRowSelectors. Use ui.grid to get reference to the igGrid the igRowSelectors are initialized for. Use ui.state to get the state of the checkbox ("on","off"). Use ui.isHeader to check if the header check box is the one being clicked. In this case no row related args are passed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.RowSelectionChanging
member.summary: Event fired before row(s) are about to be selected (cancellable). Return false in order to cancel selection changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.row.element to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.row.index to get row index. Use ui.selectedRows to get reference to rows object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.RowSelectionChanged
member.summary: Event fired after row(s) are selected. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.row.element to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.row.index to get row index. Use ui.selectedRows to get reference to rows object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.CellSelectionChanging
member.summary: Event fired before cell(s) are about to be selected (cancellable). Return false in order to cancel cell selection changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.cell.element to get reference to cell DOM element. Use ui.cell.columnKey to get reference to column key. Use ui.cell.index to get column index. Use ui.cell.row to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.cell.rowIndex to get row index. Use ui.selectedCells to get reference to selected cells object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.CellSelectionChanged
member.summary: Event fired after cell(s) are selected. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.cell.element to get reference to cell DOM element. Use ui.cell.columnKey to get reference to column key. Use ui.cell.index to get column index. Use ui.cell.row to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.cell.rowIndex to get row index. Use ui.selectedCells to get reference to selected cells object array. ui.manual - returns true if internal trigger.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.ActiveCellChanging
member.summary: Event fired before a cell becomes active (focus style applied) (cancellable). Return false in order to cancel active cell changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.cell.element to get reference to cell DOM element. Use ui.cell.columnKey to get column key. Use ui.cell.index to get column index. Use ui.cell.row to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.cell.rowIndex to get row index.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.ActiveCellChanged
member.summary: Event fired after a cell becomes active (focus style applied). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.cell.row to get reference to row DOM element. Use ui.cell.rowIndex to get row index.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.ActiveRowChanging
member.summary: Event fired before a row becomes active (focus style applied) (cancellable). Return false in order to cancel active row changing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.row.element to get reference to active row DOM element. Use ui.row.index to get active row index.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSelectionClientEvents.ActiveRowChanged
member.summary: Event fired after a row becomes active (focus style applied). Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSelection. member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ColumnSorting
member.summary: Event fired before sorting is invoked for a certain column. Return false in order to cancel column sorting. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSorting. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.columnKey to get column key. Use ui.direction to get sorting direction.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ColumnSorted
member.summary: Event fired after the column has already been sorted and data - re-rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridSorting. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.columnKey to get column key. Use ui.direction to get sorting direction.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogOpening
member.summary: Event fired before the modal dialog is opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.columnChooserElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogOpened
member.summary: Event fired after the modal dialog is already opened. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogMoving
member.summary: Event fired every time the modal dialog changes its position. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.originalPosition to get the original position of the modal dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page. Use ui.position to get the current position of the modal dialog div as { top, left } object, relative to the page.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogClosing
member.summary: Event fired before the modal dialog is closed. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogClosed
member.summary: Event fired after the modal dialog has been closed. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogContentsRendering
member.summary: Event fired before the contents of the modal dialog are rendered. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogContentsRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the contents of the modal dialog are rendered. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogSortingChanged
member.summary: Event fired when sorting of column is changed in modal dialog. Column should be sorted. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key. Use ui.isAsc to get whether column should be ascending or not. If true it should be ascending.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogButtonUnsortClick
member.summary: Event fired when button to unsort column is clicked in modal dialog. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogSortClick
member.summary: Event fired when column(which is not sorted) is clicked to be sorted in modal dialog. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnKey to get the column key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogButtonApplyClick
member.summary: Event fired when button Apply in modal dialog is clicked. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object. Use ui.columnsToSort to get array of columns which should be sorted - array of objects of sort order - Asc/Desc and columnIdentifier.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSortingClientEvents.ModalDialogButtonResetClick
member.summary: Event fired when the button to reset sorting is clicked. The handler function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get the reference to the igGridSorting widget. Use ui.owner.grid to get the reference to the igGrid widget. Use ui.modalDialogElement to get a reference to the modal dialog element. This is a jQuery object.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Summaries (igGridSummaries widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.DropDownOpening
member.summary: Event fired before drop down is opened for a specific column summary. Return false in order to cancel opening the drop down. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is opening. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.DropDownOpened
member.summary: Event fired after the summaries dropdown is opened for a specific column. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is shown. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.DropDownClosing
member.summary: Event fired before the dropdown for a summary column starts closing. Return false in order to cancel closing the drop down. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is closing. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.DropDownClosed
member.summary: Event fired after the dropdown for a summary column is closed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where drop down is closing. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.SummariesCalculating
member.summary: Event fired before summaries calculations are made. Return false in order to cancel calculation of summaries. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.SummariesCalculated
member.summary: Event fired after summaries calculation are completely made. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.data to get data for calculated summaries. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.SummariesMethodSelectionChanged
member.summary: Event fired when user selects/deselects summary method from checkbox. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key of the column where it is changed selection of summary method. Use ui.isSelected to get whether method is selected or not. Use ui.methodName to get summary method name. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.SummariesToggling
member.summary: Event is fired before summary rows start toggling. Return false in order to cancel showing/hiding of summaries. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.isToShow to get whether summaries are shown or not. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.SummariesToggled
member.summary: Event is fired after summary rows are toggled. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.isToShow to get whether summaries are shown or not. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.DropDownOKClicked
member.summary: Event is fired when OK button is clicked in drop down. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key for which OK button is clicked. Use ui.eventData to get data about which summary methods are(not) selected. Format of event data is {type = "min"; active: false};. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridSummariesClientEvents.DropDownCancelClicked
member.summary: Event is fired when Cancel button is clicked in drop down. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.columnKey to get column key for which Cancel button is clicked. Use ui.owner in order to access the igGridSummaries widget object.

Use args.element to get a reference to the cell the tooltip is displayed for. Use args.index to get the row index of the cell the tooltip is displayed for. member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Format
member.summary:
format for cells
If DataType is "date", then supported formats are following:
"date", "dateLong", "dateTime", "time", "timeLong", "MM/dd/yyyy", "MMM-d, yy, h:mm:ss tt", "dddd d MMM", etc.
If DataType is "number" or not set, then supported numeric formats are following:
"number", "currency", "percent", "int", "double", "0.00", "#.0####", "0", "#.#######", etc. The value of "double" will be similar to "number", but with unlimited maximum number of decimal places
If DataType is "string" or not set, then format is rendered as it is with replacement of possible "{0}" flag by value in cell
Example, if format is set to "Name: {0}" and value in cell is "Bob", then value will appear as "Name: Bob"
If DataType is "bool", then supported format is "checkbox" which will override the RenderCheckboxes property of grid.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridColumn.Template
member.summary: Sets a template for an individual column. the contents of the template should be the HTML markup that goes inside the table cell, without any and tags included in front and at the end. The syntax of the template, when referencing data keys and using conditional expressions is the same as the one for rowTemplate

member.summary: Sets a rowspan for the grid column. Rowspan will be applied if the grid has multicolumn headers

member.summary: Sets a space-separated list of CSS classes to be applied on the header cell of this column

member.summary: Sets a space-separated list of CSS classes to be applied on the data cells of this column.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Grid Updating (igGridUpdating widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowStarting
member.summary: Event which is raised before start row editing. Return false in order to cancel editing and do not show editors in row. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowStarted
member.summary: Event which is raised after start row editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowEnding
member.summary: Event which is raised before end row editing. Return false in order to cancel update of data source. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.keepEditing=true in order to keep editing. It has effect only when evt.originalEvent is defined. Use ui.update to check if value of any cell was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding. Use ui.values[key] to get value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get old value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditRowEnded
member.summary: Event which is raised after end row editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.update to check if value of any cell was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding. Use ui.values[key] to get value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get old value of cell in column with the key. That is available only when ui.update is true.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellStarting
member.summary: Event which is raised before start cell editing. Return false in order to cancel start editing and do not show editors. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get or set value of editor. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellStarted
member.summary: Event which is raised after start cell editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get value of editor. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellEnding
member.summary: Event which is raised before end cell editing. Return false in order to cancel update of data source. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.keepEditing=true in order to keep editing. It has effect only when evt.originalEvent is defined and only when editMode is "cell". Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get value of cell/editor. That value can be modified and it will be used to update data source. Use ui.oldValue to get old value. Use ui.update to check if value was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.EditCellEnded
member.summary: Event which is raised after end cell editing. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row. Use ui.columnIndex to get index of column. Use ui.columnKey to get key of column. Use ui.editor to get reference to igEditor. Use ui.value to get value of cell. Use ui.oldValue to get old value. Use ui.update to check if cell was modified and data source will be updated. Use ui.rowAdding to check if that event is raised while new-row-adding.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowAdding
member.summary: Event which is raised before adding new row. Return false in order to cancel adding new row to data source. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.values[key] to get new value of cell in column with the key. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get default value (before editing) of cell in column with the key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowAdded
member.summary: Event which is raised after adding new row. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.values[key] to get new value of cell in column with the key. Use ui.oldValues[key] to get default value (before editing) of cell in column with the key.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowDeleting
member.summary: Event which is raised before row deleting. Return false in order to cancel. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.element to get reference to jquery object which represents TR of row to delete. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row to delete.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowDeleted
member.summary: Event which is raised after row deleting. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.element to get reference to jquery object which represents TR of row to delete. Use ui.rowID to get key or index of row to delete.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.DataDirty
member.summary: Event which is raised when autoCommit of grid is not enabled and grid has pending transaction which may fail to be correctly rendered. Application should process that event and it may trigger commit of grid. Return false in order to prevent exception. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.GeneratePrimaryKeyValue
member.summary: Event which is raised before adding new row to get value of cell for primaryKey column. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.owner.grid to get reference to igGrid. Use ui.value to set unique record-key-identifier for new row. It is prefilled with suggested value (defaultValue of column or number of rows in data source).

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogOpening
member.summary: Event fired before the row edit dialog is opened. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogOpened
member.summary: Event fired after the row edit dialog is opened. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogContentsRendering
member.summary: Event fired before the contents of the row edit dialog are rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogContentsRendered
member.summary: Event fired after the contents of the row edit dialog are rendered. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogClosing
member.summary: Event fired before the row edit dialog is closed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridUpdatingClientEvents.RowEditDialogClosed
member.summary: Event fired after the row edit dialog is closed. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.owner to get reference to igGridUpdating. Use ui.dialogElement to get reference to row edit dialog DOM element.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions
member.summary: Combo editor options for column updating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownAttachedToBody
member.summary: Gets sets ability to append container of drop-down list to the body or to the parent of combo.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.Virtualization
member.summary: Gets sets ability to use virtual rendering for drop-down list. If that option is enabled, then only visible items are created and top edge of first visible item in list is aligned to the top edge of list.

remarks.p: Default value is 'false'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.CaseSensitive
member.summary: Set ability to use case sensitive or ignore case searching for matches defined by RenderMatchItems and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AutoSelectFirstMatch
member.summary: Gets sets whether the first matching item should be auto selected when typing in input.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.CloseDropDownOnBlur
member.summary: Gets sets ability to close drop-down list when control loses focus.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownOnFocus
member.summary: Set ability to show drop-down list when Combo gets focus.

remarks.p: Note: that property is not related to FilteringType and FilteringCondition.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.CloseDropDownOnSelect
member.summary: Gets sets ability to close drop down list when single item in the list is selected with mouse click or enter press. The default value when multi selection is enabled will be false. This option will not close the drop down when multiple selection is enabled and selection with ctrl or shift is performed.

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.SelectItemBySpaceKey
member.summary: Set ability to select active item in list by Space key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.CompactData
member.summary: Sets ability to send to client all data or only required data (TextKey and ValueKey).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.PreventSubmitOnEnter
member.summary: Gets sets ability to prevent form submitting on enter key press

remarks.p: Default value is 'true'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.EnableClearButton
member.summary: Set ability to show a button which allows to clear field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AutoComplete
member.summary: Gets sets ability to autocomplete field from first matching item in list

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DataSource
member.summary: Set data source for data displayed in list.

remarks.p:
The expected value is instance of IQueryable.
It also can be array of objects, which represent rows in list.
If value is string value, then it is assumed to be an url address which points to source of data.
Example: "http ://odata.netflix.com/Catalog/Titles?$format=json&$callback=?"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ValidatorOptions
member.summary: Sets validation options.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.LoadOnDemandSettings
member.summary: Sets load on demand settings. If CascadingSettings.ParentComboKey is set, then LoadOnDemand is not supported.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.MultiSelectionSettings
member.summary: Gets sets object specifying multi selection feature options. The object has following properties enabled, addWithKeyModifier, showCheckboxes and itemSeparator. Set enabled to true to turn multi selection on. Set addWithKeyModifier to true to disable the additive selection, then additive selection can be done by ctrl + mouse click / enter. Set showCheckboxes to true to render check boxes in front of each drop down item. Use itemSeparator to set what string to be rendered between items in field. Note showCheckboxes and itemSeparator has effect only if multi selection is enabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.InitialSelectedItemsSettings
member.summary: a list of initial selected items

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.Width
member.summary: Gets sets width of combo.

remarks.p: The numeric and string values (valid html units for size) are supported. It includes %, px, em and other units.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.Height
member.summary: Gets sets height of combo.

remarks.p: The numeric and string values (valid html units for size) are supported. It includes %, px, em and other units.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DataSourceType
member.summary: Gets sets data source type (such as "json", "xml", etc). Please refer to the documentation of $.ig.DataSource and its type property.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DataSourceUrl
member.summary: Gets sets url which is used for sending JSON on request for remote filtering (MVC for example). That option is required when load on demand is enabled and its type is remote.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ResponseTotalRecCountKey
member.summary: Sets property in the response specifying the total number of records on the server.

remarks.p: see $.ig.DataSource. property in the response specifying the total number of records on the server.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ResponseDataKey
member.summary: Sets the name of record which holds the list of data rows in response-JSON object and when CompactData is disabled.

remarks.p: Default value is set to "Records". It means that rows of items should belong to the Records object.
For more information, consult documentation for javascript of $.ig.DataSource.
This is basically the property in the responses where data records are held, if the response is wrapped.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ResponseContentType
member.summary: Content type of the response.

remarks.p: See http://api.jquery.com/jQuery.ajax/ => contentType.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.RequestType
member.summary: Specifies the HTTP verb to be used to issue the request

remarks.p: Default value is set to 'GET'

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ValueKey
member.summary: Sets name of column which contains the "value".

remarks.p: If it is missing, then name of first column will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.TextKey
member.summary: Sets name of column which contains the displayed text.

remarks.p: If it is missing, then ValueKey will be used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ItemTemplate
member.summary: Gets sets template used to render an item in list.

remarks.p:
Notes:
1. The jquery.tmpl.js of Microsoft is used and application should provide supported syntax for content. 2. Template is rendered inside of LI html element. So, application should consider restriction for layout: do not use "block" html elements and in case of absolutely positioned elements, they should not overlap with checkbox icons.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.InputName
member.summary: Gets sets name of the hidden INPUT element, which is used when submiting data. Its value will be set to values of selected items valueKeys separated by "," character on any change in igCombo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.NoMatchFoundText
member.summary: Gets sets text of list item for condition when "filteringType" option is enabled and no match was found. That is an override for the $.ig.Combo.locale.noMatchFoundText.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.PlaceHolder
member.summary: Gets sets value that is displayed when input field is empty. Default value is 'select...'.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ID
member.summary: Sets id of the combo

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.UseExistingElement
member.summary: Sets the ID of the Combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.Format
member.summary: Gets or sets the format string that is used to format the text display values in the combo. Valid options are: "auto" (default) - uses automatic formatting for Date and number objects. "none", "", or null - will disable formatting Custom values can be something like "currency", "percent", "dateLong", "time", "MMM-dd-yyyy H:mm tt", etc. Custom format strings should match the data type in "textKey" column.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.FilterExprUrlKey
member.summary: Gets sets url key name that specifies how the remote filtering expressions will be encoded for remote requests, e.g. '&filter('col') = startsWith.' Default is OData

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownButtonTitle
member.summary: Gets sets title for html element which represend drop-down button. That is an override for the $.ig.Combo.locale.dropDownButtonTitle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ClearButtonTitle
member.summary: Gets sets title for html element which represend clear button. That is an override for the $.ig.Combo.locale.clearButtonTitle.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.HeaderTemplate
member.summary: Gets sets template used to render header in drop-down list.

remarks.p: The template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.FooterTemplate
member.summary: Gets sets template used to render footer in drop-down list.

remarks.p: The template is rendered inside of DIV html element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownWidth
member.summary: Sets width of drop-down list in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value is 0 and width of combo is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of show drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of hide drop-down list animation in milliseconds.

remarks.p: Default value is 400.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.VisibleItemsCount
member.summary: Gets sets how many items should be shown at once.

remarks.p:
Notes:
That options is used for virtualization in order to render initial list items.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DelayFilteringOnKeyUp
member.summary: Specifies the delay duration before triggering next filtering operation. Useful to boost performance by lowering the filtering operations count.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.TabIndex
member.summary: Gets sets tabIndex for field of combo.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.ResponseDataType
member.summary: Response type when a URL is set as the data source.

remarks.p:
Notes:
json type="string" xml type="string" html type="string" script type="string" jsonp type="string" text type="string"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.FilteringType
member.summary: Gets sets type of filtering.

remarks.p:
Notes:
If this option is set to "remote", then the "css.waitFiltering" is applied to combo and its drop-down list. remote type="string" filtering is performed by server. local type="string" filtering is performed by $.ig.DataSource. none type="string" filtering is disabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.FilteringCondition
member.summary: Gets sets condition used for filtering. type="contains|doesNotContain|startsWith|endsWith|greaterThan|lessThan|greaterThanOrEqualTo|lessThanOrEqualTo|equals|doesNotEqual

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.FilteringLogic
member.summary: Gets sets filtering logic. type="OR|AND"

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.Mode
member.summary: Sets gets functionality mode. editable type="string" Allows to modify value by edit field and drop-down list. dropdown type="string" Allows to modify value by drop-down list only. readonlylist type="string" Allows to open list, but does not allow any changes in field or selection in drop-down list. If selection is not set, then first item in dataSource is automatically selected. readonly type="string" Does not allow to open list or change value in field. If selection is not set, then first item in dataSource is automatically selected.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.HighlightMatchesMode
member.summary: Gets sets condition used for highlighting of matching parts in items of drop-down list. multi type="string" multiple matches in a single item are rendered. contains type="string" match at any position in item is rendered. startsWith type="string" only match which starts from the beginning of text is rendered. full type="string" only fully matched items are rendered. null type="object" matches are not rendered.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingComboEditorOptions.DropDownOrientation
member.summary: Gets sets drop down opening orientation for the dorp down list when open button is clicked 'auto' type="string" Calculate orientation depending on combo position 'top' type="string" Top orientation 'bottom' type="string" Bottom orientation

member.summary: Combo editor options for column updating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.DateInputFormat
member.summary:
Sets format or pattern of date fields.
It can be regional-pattern-flags such as "date", "dateLong", "time", "timeLong", "dateTime". Or it can be explicit date-time patterns such as "d/MM/yyyy", "d-M-yy, HH:mm:ss", "h:mm tt, fff", etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.PromptCharacter
member.summary: Sets prompt character.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.Regional
member.summary:
Sets name of regional setting.
That property can be used, only when application provides $.ig.regional[value] javascript object, which contains custom values recognized by igDateEditor.
Example for members of that object can be found in the $.ig._regional, which is located in ig.util.js file and contains default values.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.DataMode
member.summary: Set data mode which defines logic to get/set value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.MinValue
member.summary: Set minimum value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.MaxValue
member.summary: Set maximum value.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ColumnUpdatingDateEditorOptions.MinNumberOfDateFields
member.summary: Set minimum number of date fields to consider date valid.

member.summary: Date-time editor and date-picker options for column updating.

Sets name of regional setting.
That property can be used, only when application provides $.ig.regional[value] javascript object, which contains custom values recognized by igNumericEditor.
Example for members of that object can be found in the $.ig._regional, which is located in ig.util.js file and contains default values.

member.summary: Sets the position at which to start rendering the ranges, measured from the front/bottom of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGauge`1.ScaleInnerExtent(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the position at which to start rendering the scale, measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the control as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGauge`1.RangeOuterExtent(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the position at which to stop rendering the range as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGauge`1.ScaleOuterExtent(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the position at which to stop rendering the scale as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the bottom/front (when orientation is horizontal/vertical) of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGauge`1.NeedleInnerExtent(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the position at which to start rendering the needle geometry, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge as a value from 0 to 1. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGauge`1.NeedleOuterExtent(System.Double)
member.summary: Sets the position at which to stop rendering the needle geometry as a value from 0 to 1 measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.summary: Sets the interval to use for rendering labels. This defaults to be the same interval as the tickmarks on the scale.

member.summary: Sets the position at which to put the labels as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the bottom of the scale. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to hide the labels of the linear gauge.

member.summary: A value to start adding labels, added to the scale's MinimumValue.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGauge`1.LabelsPreTerminal(System.Double)
member.summary: A value to stop adding labels, subtracted from the scale's MaximumValue.

member.summary: Sets the position at which to start rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.summary: Sets the position at which to stop rendering the major tickmarks as a value from 0 to 1, measured from the front/bottom of the linear gauge. Values further from zero than 1 can be used to make this extend further than the normal size of the linear gauge.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGaugeClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by LinearGauge (igLinearGauge widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGaugeClientEvents.FormatLabel
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a label of the linear gauge is formatted.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to linear gauge widget.
Use ui.actualMinimumValue to obtain the mimimum value of linear gauge scale.
Use ui.actualMaximumValue to obtain the maximum value of linear gauge scale.
Use ui.value to obtain the value on the linear gauge scale associated with the label.
Use ui.label to obtain the string value of the label.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.LinearGaugeClientEvents.AlignLabel
member.summary:
Event which is raised when a label of the linear gauge is aligned along the scale.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to linear gauge widget.
Use ui.actualMinimumValue to obtain the mimimum value of linear gauge scale.
Use ui.actualMaximumValue to obtain the maximum value of linear gauge scale.
Use ui.value to obtain the value on the linear gauge scale associated with the label.
Use ui.label to obtain the string value of the label. Use ui.width to obtain the width of the label.
Use ui.height to obtain the height of the label.
Use ui.offsetX to obtain the X offset of the label on the linear gauge scale.
Use ui.offsetY to obtain the Y offset of the label on the linear gauge scale.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.MdxSettings.DimensionPropertiesOnColumns
member.summary: Gets or sets a list of the names of intrinsic non-context sensitive member properties applied on COLUMNS axis. By defult CHILDREN_CARDINALITY and PARENT_UNIQUE_NAME properties are always added to DIMENSION PROPERTIES.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by PivotDataSelector (igPivotDataSelector widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DataSelectorRendered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data selector is rendered. Changing the data source instance will re-render the data selector.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DataSourceInitialized
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has initialized.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during initialization.
Use ui.metadataTreeRoot to get a reference to the root of the data source metatadata root item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DataSourceUpdated
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has updated.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during update.
Use ui.result to get the result of the update operation.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DeferUpdateChanged
member.summary:
Event which is raised when the defer update checkbox changes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the data selector.
Use ui.deferUpdate to get the defer update value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DragStart
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag start.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.Drag
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.DragStop
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag stop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataDropping
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataDropped
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataRemoving
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the dragged element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.MetadataRemoved
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpening
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the filter members drop down opens.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpened
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members drop down opens.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterMembersLoaded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members are loaded.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.rootFilterMembers for a collection with the root filter members.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownOk
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the OK button in the filter members drop down is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.filterMembers for a collection with the selected filter members. If all filter members are selected the collection will be empty.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.filterDropDownClosing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the filter members drop down closes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotDataSelectorClientEvents.FilterDropDownClosed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members drop down closes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by PivotGrid (igPivotGrid widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DataSourceInitialized
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has initialized.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during initialization.
Use ui.metadataTreeRoot to get a reference to the root of the data source metatadata root item.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DataSourceUpdated
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the data source has updated.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.error to see if an error has occured during update.
Use ui.result to get the result of the update operation.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.PivotGridHeadersRendered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the headers have been rendered.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.grid to get a reference to the igGrid widget, which holds the headers.
Use ui.table to get a reference to the headers table DOM element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.PivotGridRendered
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the whole grid widget has been rendered (including headers, footers, etc.).
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.grid to get a reference to the igGrid widget, which holds the headers.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberExpanding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the expand of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberExpanded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the expand of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberCollapsing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the collapse of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.TupleMemberCollapsed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the collapse of the tuple member.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.dataSource to get a reference to the data source.
Use ui.axisName to get the name of axis, which holds the member and the tuple.
Use ui.memberIndex to get the index of the member in the axis.
Use ui.tupleIndex to get the index of the tuple in the member.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.Sorting
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the sorting of the columns.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.sortDirections to get an array of the tuple indices and sort directions that will be used.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.Sorted
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the sorting of the columns.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.sortDirections to get an array of the tuple indices and sort directions that were passed to the table view.
Use ui.appliedSortDirections to get an array of the tuple indices and sort directions that were actually applied to the table view.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.HeadersSorting
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the sorting of the headers.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.levelSortDirections to get an array of the level names and sort directions that will be used.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.HeadersSorted
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the sorting of the headers.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to get a reference to the pivot grid.
Use ui.levelSortDirections to get an array of the level names and sort directions that were used.
Use ui.appliedLevelSortDirections to get an array of the level names and sort directions that were actually applied to the table view.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DragStart
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag start.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.Drag
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.DragStop
member.summary:
Event which is raised on drag stop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.originalPosition to get a reference to the original position of the draggable element.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataDropping
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataDropped
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item drop.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the drop target.
Use ui.draggedElement for a reference to the metadata item element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.
Use ui.metadataIndex to get the index at which the metadata will be inserted.
Use ui.helper to get a reference to the helper.
Use ui.offset to get a reference to the offset.
Use ui.position to get a reference to the current position of the draggable element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataRemoving
member.summary:
Event which is raised before a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.targetElement for a reference to the dragged element.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.MetadataRemoved
member.summary:
Event which is raised after a metadata item is removed when the user clicks the close icon.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.metadata to get a reference to the data.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpening
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the filter members drop down opens.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownOpened
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members drop down opens.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterMembersLoaded
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members are loaded.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.rootFilterMembers for a collection with the root filter members.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownOk
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the OK button in the filter members drop down is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.filterMembers for a collection with the selected filter members. If all filter members are selected the collection will be empty.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.filterDropDownClosing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before the filter members drop down closes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.
Use ui.dropDownElement for a reference to the drop down.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PivotGridClientEvents.FilterDropDownClosed
member.summary:
Event which is raised after the filter members drop down closes.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.hierarchy for a reference to the hierarchy.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Popover (igPopover widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Showing
member.summary: Event fired before a popover is shown. Return false in order to cancel action. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover will show for. Use ui.content to get or set the content to be shown as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element showing. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Shown
member.summary: Event fired after popover is shown. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover showed for. Use ui.content to get or set the content was shown as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element shown. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Hiding
member.summary: Event fired before a popover is hidden. Return false in order to cancel action. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover will hide for. Use ui.content to get the current content displayed in the popover as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element hiding. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PopoverClientEvents.Hidden
member.summary: Event fired after popover is hidden. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.element to get the element the popover hid for. Use ui.content to get the current content displayed in the popover as a string. Use ui.popover to get the popover element hidden. Use ui.owner to get reference to the igPopover widget

member.summary: Describes the tree grid filtering feature

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFiltering.#ctor
member.summary: creates a new tree grid filtering setting with default values

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFiltering.FromLevel
member.summary: specifies from which data bound level to be applied filtering - 0 is the first level

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFiltering.ToLevel
member.summary: specifies to which data bound level to be applied filtering - if -1 filtering should be applied to the last data bound level

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFiltering.DisplayMode
member.summary: if displayMode is showWithAncestorsAndDescendants - even if child records don't match filtering conditions. If displayMode is showWithAncestors show only those records that match filtering conditions and do not show child records(if any) that don't match filtering conditions

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFiltering.MatchFiltering
member.summary: Name of property in dataRecord object - indicates whether dataRow matches filtering conditions.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFilteringWrapper
member.summary: wrapper around GridFiltering, allows for chained calls and fluent syntax

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFilteringWrapper.FromLevel(System.Int32)
member.summary: specifies from which data bound level to be applied filtering - 0 is the first level

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFilteringWrapper.ToLevel(System.Int32)
member.summary: specifies to which data bound level to be applied filtering - if -1 filtering should be applied to the last data bound level

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFilteringWrapper.DisplayMode(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFilteringDisplayMode)
member.summary: if showWithAncestorsAndDescendants show child records(if any) - even if child records don't match filtering conditions. If showWithAncestors show only those records that match filtering conditions(and their parent records) and do not show child records(if any) that don't match filtering conditions

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridFilteringWrapper.MatchFiltering(System.String)
member.summary: Name of property in dataRecord object - indicates whether dataRow matches filtering conditions.

member.summary: reference to the GridFiltering object

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AutoGenerateColumns(System.Boolean)
member.summary: when true, column collection will be automatically generated based on the data source column names and data types

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.Virtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: virtualization allows a fixed portion of the DOM to be rendered and reused for performance purposes

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.VirtualizationMode(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VirtualizationMode)
member.summary: virtualization mode allows to switch between 'fixed' and 'continuous' virtualization modes

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.RowVirtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: vertical virtualization (vertical scrolling ) , for rows only

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.ColumnVirtualization(System.Boolean)
member.summary: horizontal virtualization (horizontal scrolling), for columns only

member.summary: the templating engine that will be used to render the grid and some specific parts of its ui

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.DataSource(System.Object)
member.summary: reference to the data source object holding data row objects (IQueryable, etc.)

member.summary: Url from which to fetch data, after the grid has been rendered for the first time (if DataSource is not set and the grid is rendered) it will use the DataSourceUrl to fetch rows (the backend doesn't need to match the MVC backend in that case)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.ClientDataSourceType(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ClientDataSourceType)
member.summary: type of the data source, when DataSourceUrl is specified

member.summary: toggles visibility of the column headers

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.FixedHeaders(System.Boolean)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.FixedFooters(System.Boolean)
member.summary: see FixedHeaders

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.TabIndex(System.Int32)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AccessibilityRendering(System.Boolean)
member.summary: when accessibility rendering is enabled, all cells and rows have role and aria-describedby attributes rendered

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.LocalSchemaTransform(System.Boolean)
member.summary: when local schema transforming is turned off (default for the MVC grid), there is no additional transformation of data and data types on the client, that is, data is assumed to come in the correct format and # of columns from the server

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.GenerateCompactJSONResponse(System.Boolean)
M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.UpdateUrl(System.String)
member.summary: UpdateUrl is optional and can be set when Updating is enabled. The UpdateUrl should point to an MVC controller action which will handle persisting changes in the data base through LInQ

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.RestSettings(System.Action{Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RestSettingBuilder{`0}})
member.summary: Settings related to REST compliant update routine. This setting is optional and is going to be used only if Updating is enabled.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.OData(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If true, encodes all requests using OData conventions and the $expand syntax.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.Rest(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If true, load on demand will be achieved using REST compliant resource access with appropriate url-s for the ajax GET calls.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AutoCommit(System.Boolean)
member.summary: auto generation of column layouts (hierarchical view)

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AggregateTransactions(System.Boolean)
member.summary: enables aggregation of transactions according to the following rules if a new row is added, and then deleted, there will be no transaction added to the log if a new role is added, edited, then deleted, there will be no transaction added to the log if several edits are made to a row or an individual cell, this should result in a single transaction

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AutoFormat(Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridAutoFormat)
member.summary: auto format options of cell values in grid for numeric and date columns

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AutofitLastColumn(System.Boolean)
member.summary: If autofitLastColumn is true and all columns' widths are specified and their combined width is less than the grid width then the last column width will be automatically adjusted to fill the entire grid.

member.summary: If true then the unbound columns are merged to the datasource at runtime - indeed DataSource is expanded with the new data and this could cause performance issues when dataSource is huge if false then the unbound data is sent to the client
