member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.ClientEvents(System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String})
member.summary:
Set implementations of client events raised by a widget.
Event handler assumes 2 parameters: 1st parameter has name "evt" and 2nd parameter has name "ui". To get information about member variables available for "ui" parameter, please consult documentation of a widget and its events.
Examples:
1. Full implementation:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "function(evt,ui){alert('drop:'+ui.owner);}" } }
2. Content of inline function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "alert('drop:'+ui.owner);" } }
3. Name of global function:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { "dropDownOpening", "nameOfGlobalFunction" } } Note:
Instead of explicit key-strings, which represent name of event exposed by a widget, the event-constants defined by a particular control can be used.
Example:
new Dictionary<string, string> { { ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpening, "nameOfGlobalFunction" } }

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ITreeGrid`1.AddClientEvent(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds javascript function to process client event of widget.
member.param:
Name over available for widget.
It is recommended to use string constants available for a specific widget.
Examples: ComboClientEvents.DropDownOpened, DialogClientEvents.StateChanged, etc.
Name of javascript function which processes event, or content of function, or full implementation of function.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Tree Grid Framework (igTreeGrid widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowExpanding
member.summary: Event which is fired when a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is about to be expanded. Return false in order to cancel row expanding. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that should be expanded(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent)fixed row element that is about to expanded(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataLevel to access the databound level of the topmost treegrid row to be expanded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowExpanded
member.summary: Event which is fired after a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is expanded. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that was expanded(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent)fixed row element that was expanded(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound level of the topmost treegrid row that was expanded.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowCollapsing
member.summary: Event which is fired when a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is about to be collapsed. Return false in order to cancel row collapsing. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that should be collapsed(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent fixed)row element that is going to be collapsed(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound level of the topmost treegrid row to be collapsed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.RowCollapsed
member.summary: Event which is fired after a treegrid row(for the most parent layout) is collapsed. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element(for the most parent layout) that was collapsed(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a (top most parent fixed)row element that was collapsed(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the topmost treegrid row that was collapsed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowExpanding
member.summary: Event which is fired when a child treegrid row is about to be shown. Return false in order to cancel child row expanding. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that should be shown(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that should be shown(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowExpanded
member.summary: Event which is fired after a child treegrid row is shown. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that is shown(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that is shown(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowCollapsing
member.summary: Event which is fired when a child treegrid row is about to be hidden. Return false in order to cancel child row collapsing. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that should be hidden(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that should be hidden(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.TreeGridClientEvents.ChildRowCollapsed
member.summary: Event which is fired after a child treegrid row is hidden. Use args.owner to access the treegrid object. Use args.row to access a row element that is hidden(jQuery representation). Use args.fixedRow to access a fixed row element that is hidden(jQuery representation). If there aren't fixed columns it is undefined. Use args.dataBoundDepth to access the databound depth level of the treegrid row.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by File Upload (igUpload widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileSelecting
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload selecting event. Fired when browse button is pressed. Return false in order to cancel selecting file. Function takes argument evt.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileSelected
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload selected event. Fired when file is selected from browse dialog. Return false in order to cancel uploading file. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileUploading
member.summary: Defines the name of the file uploading event. Fired every time when fileuploader get status for the upload. Return false in order to cancel uploading file. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file. Use ui.uploadedBytes to get uploaded bytes. Use ui.fileStatus to get current file status. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileUploaded
member.summary: Defines the name of the uploaded event. Fired when the file is uploaded. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileUploadAborted
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload cancel event. Fired when the server responses that the file is canceled. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file. Use ui.filePath to get the name of the uploaded file. Use ui.totalSize to get the file size of the uploaded file. Use ui.uploadedBytes to get uploaded bytes. Use ui.fileStatus to get current file status. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.CancelAllClicked
member.summary: Defines the name of the cancel all button event click. Fired when cancel all button in summary is clicked. Fired only in multiple upload mode. Function takes argument evt and ui. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.OnError
member.summary: Defines the name of the file upload error event. Fired when error is occurred. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.errorCode to get current errorCode. Use ui.errorMessage to get detailed error description. Use ui.errorType to get error type - it could be clientside or serverside. Use ui.serverMessage to get specific server message returned by server - if errorType is serverside. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.FileExtensionsValidating
member.summary: It is fired when validating file extensions Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileName to get the full file name Use ui.fileExtension to get file extension Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.OnXHRLoad
member.summary: It is fired when event onload(of XmlHttpRequest) is fired. This event will be fired only if the browser supports HTML5 file API Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file Use ui.xhr to get reference to the original XMLHttpRequest object Use ui.fileInfo to get reference to the fileInfo object - containing information for fileName, fileSize, serverMessage(if returned from the server-side), etc. Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.UploadClientEvents.OnFormDataSubmit
member.summary: It is fired before submitting to the server the uploading file(and its additional data if any). It could be used to append additional data fields to the FormData object(if the browser supports HTML5 file API - like newest Chrome, Firefox, IE11+). If the browser does not support HTML5 file API(IE10 and older) it could be added these data fields(as hidden input fields) to the form. Use the public API function addDataFields. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.fileId to get unique identifier of the file Use ui.fileInfo to get reference to the fileInfo object - containing information for the fileName, fileSize, serverMessage, etc. Use ui.xhr to get reference to the original XMLHttpRequest object(if the browser supports HTML 5 file API - if not it is undefined) Use ui.formData to get reference to FormData object(if the browser supports HTML5 file API) OR reference to jQuery representation of FORM Use ui.owner in order to access the igUpload widget object.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.CurrencyEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Nullable
member.summary: Enables null value in editor. If that options is disabled, then current date is used is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.TabIndex
member.summary: Sets tabIndex attribute for editor

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.CenturyThreshold
member.summary: Sets year for auto detection of 20th and 21st centuries. That option is used to automatically fill century when the user entered only 1 or 2 digits into the year field or when the date pattern contains only 1 or 2 year positions, e.g. "yy" or "y". If user entered value larger than value of this option, then 20th century is used, otherwise the 21st.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.EnableUTCDates
member.summary: Sets formatting of the dates as UTC. That option is supported only when DataMode option is 'Date' and Date objects are used to get/set value of editor. Notes: That option affects only functionality of get/set value method and the Date-value, which was set on initialization. When application uses the set-value, then internal Date-value and displayed-text is incremented by TimezoneOffset. When application uses the get-value, then editor returns internal Date-value decremented by TimezoneOffset.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ReduceDayOfInvalidDate
member.summary: Sets ability to decrease day of month. Value of true allows decreasing day of month, when editor loses focus and user entered day of month which is larger the maximum for that particular month. Value of false will automatically increment month and decrease day of month. Examples. If true and user entered "09/31/2010", then on lost focus that string will be converted to "09/30/2010". If false, then in similar situation the string will be converted to "10/01/2010".

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.UseLastGoodDate
member.summary: Set ability to use last valid date when user entered invalid value. Value of true allows automatically use last valid date, when editor loses focus and user failed to enter a valid date. In case of value false, the entered date is considered invalid and null is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.YearShift
member.summary: Sets difference between year in Gregorian calendar and displayed year.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.Spin1Field
member.summary: Sets ability to modify only 1 date field on spin events. Value false enables changes of other date fields when incremented or decremented date-field reaches its limits. Value true modifies only value of one field.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.FocusOnSpin
member.summary: Ensures that editor has focus when spin button is pressed.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.SpinDelta
member.summary: Sets gets delta-value which is used to increment or decrement the value of field where caret is located is modified.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.SpinWrapAround
member.summary: Enables circular spin: after the last item is list, the first item in list is used as next item.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListItems
member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list. Note: if that property is set, then drop-down list is used instead of drop-down calendar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListWidth
member.summary: Sets drop-down list width in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListMaxHeight
member.summary: Sets drop-down list maximum height in pixels.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListColumns
member.summary: Sets drop-down list number of columns.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ListDropDownAsChild
member.summary: Sets drop-down list as child of editor. If true create html element which represents drop-down list as child of editor, if false use the body as parent for drop-down list. Note: that property is not supported for drop-down calendar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.DropDownButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for drop-down button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.ClearButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for clear button.

member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for decrement spin button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DatePickerModel.IncrementSpinButtonTitle
member.summary: Sets title/tooltip for increment spin button.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorModel.HideEnterKey
member.summary: Hides the Enter key from browser. True: hide the Enter key, false: do not change default logic of browser related to the Enter key.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorModel.DropDownTriggers
member.summary: Sets the list of actions/flags which will be used to open drop-down list. List of actions/flags. Actions should be separated by the "," character and following flags can be used: button,focus,ctrl+arrow,alt+arrow,shift+arrow. Explicit characters can be used as well. For example: A,D,2 etc.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorModel.NullText
member.summary: Sets text which will be displayed in editor when it has no value and no focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorModel.ListItems
member.summary: Sets list of items used for drop-down list.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for editor. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.DateTimeEditorModel.RenderInContainer
member.summary: Sets option to wrap input field into SPAN. Default is false. This option is available only when base element is INPUT or TEXTAREA. If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.summary: Sets/gets required entry.

If drop-down button or spin-buttons are enabled or the theme is set, then this option has no effect. The reason for this option is to allow vertical alignment of several igEditor controls when they are located in html inline and some of them have enabled buttons. If all editors are created within SPAN wrapper, then they will appear on the same line. Otherwise, editors in SPANs will be shifted 3-6 pixels above INPUT editors.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.PercentEditorModel.DisplayFactor
member.summary: Sets the factor which used for the get and set of the "value" method. On get the number (string) entered by user is divided by that factor and on the set the number (string) displayed in editor is multiplied by that factor. For example if factor is 100 and the "value" is set to 0.123, then editor will show string "12.3".
member.remarks: The value should be a power of 10. If another value is supplied the biggest number that is a power of 10 and is less than the supplied value will be used. Values less than or equal to 0 will be ignored. Note: this option has priority over possible regional settings.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridDataSourceActionAttribute
member.summary: this is an attribute class which extends the mvc FilterAttribute. It should be put on top of the controller method that should return JSON (even though in the user code it will return Action Result). The idea of this filter is to transform the ActionResult into a JsonResult instance, taking into account all Request params such as paging, sorting, and filtering. Since MVC doesn't have ViewState, we will need to infer all the features from the request itself, that's the only information we have regarding any previous state.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.GridDataSourceActionAttribute.OnActionExecuted(System.Web.Mvc.ActionExecutedContext)
member.summary: intercepts the controller call, and transforms the action result into a json result.

member.summary: implementation of the ActionExecuting event

member.summary: virtualization mode of the grid

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VirtualizationMode.Fixed
member.summary: the body of the grid is rendered once and then repopulated when needed this mode works fine when rows height have equal size. Also, it can be used with flat grid only.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VirtualizationMode.Continuous
member.summary: the body of the grid is recreated each time when new virtual rows buffer cannot visualize the required portion of data this mode can work with different row height. It can work with flat grid hierarchical grid and all their features.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FeatureChooserIconDisplayMode
member.summary: Configures how the feature chooser icon should display on header cells - e.g. to display as gear icon or to not show gear icon but on click/tap the header cell to show the feature chooser

member.summary: Always hide the feature chooser icon; The feature chooser is shown on tapping/clicking the column header

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FeatureChooserIconDisplayMode.DesktopOnly

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.FeatureChooserIconDisplayMode.Always
member.summary: Always show it in any environment. Chooser is shown when tapping the gear icon or column header

member.summary: Enables validation with default options.

remarks.p: If Required is enabled, then validation message will appear if edit field is empty.
If MinValue and or MaxValue is set, then validation message will appear if editor has value outside of these limits.
Validation message will appear if entered value is invalid number (for example, user entered only "." or "-").

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Rating (igRating widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingClientEvents.HoverChange
member.summary:
Event which is raised before hover value is changed.
If application returns false, then action is canceled and hover value stays unchanged.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to get new value.
Use ui.oldValue to get old value.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingClientEvents.ValueChange
member.summary:
Event which is raised before (selected) value is changed.
If application returns false, then action is canceled and value stays unchanged.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.value to get new value.
Use ui.oldValue to get old value.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingPrecision
member.summary: Specifies the precision of the Rating widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingPrecision.Exact
member.summary: Exact value is used

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingPrecision.Half
member.summary: Half of vote value is used

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingPrecision.Whole
member.summary: Whole vote value is used

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.#ctor
member.summary: Create RatingModel

member.summary: Get value from client

member.summary: Get value from client

member.summary: Get value from client

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the rating.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.InputName
member.summary: Sets the name of the hidden input element that will store the value.

remarks.p: If it is not set then the value of ID is used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes for main html element used by control

remarks.p: Dictionary of attributes passed to TagBuilder.MergeAttributes(value).

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Value
member.summary: Sets value for control.

remarks.p: Value in range from 0 to 1. Default value in the widget is 0.
Note: If Value is set, then new value will have priority over value modified on client. Client value will not persist between postbacks.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteCount
member.summary: Sets number of vote items.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is 5.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Vertical
member.summary: Sets vertical orientation of control.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false and control has horizontal orientation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Precision
member.summary: Sets precision.

remarks.p: Exact, half or whole. Default value in the widget is Exact.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Disabled
member.summary: Sets disabled state of control.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.SwapDirection
member.summary: Sets swaped direction from left to right or from top to bottom in case of vertical orientation.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Focusable
member.summary: Sets option to enable control getting focus.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteItemWidth
member.summary: Sets width of vote item in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is not set and width is defined by css classes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.VoteItemHeight
member.summary: Sets height of vote item in pixels.

remarks.p: Default value in the widget is not set and height is defined by css classes.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.ValueAsPercent
member.summary: Sets option to use percentage units or vote-number units for the Value and HoverValue.

remarks.p: True: the percent (from 0 to 1) is used for value. False: the value is measured in number of votes. Default value in the widget is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.RoundedDecimalPlaces
member.summary: Sets number of decimal places used to round value.

remarks.p: To disable rounding that property should be set to -1. Default value in the widget is 3.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.Theme
member.summary: Sets theme for control. Note: in order for that option to have effect, the css classes with "theme" selectors should be available for page.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.RatingModel.PrecisionZeroVote
member.summary: Sets part of vote-size, which is considered as zero value.

remarks.p: It has effect only when precision is set to "half" or "whole". If user clicks between edge of the first vote and (sizeOfVote * precisionZeroVote), then value is set to 0. Same is applied for mouseover as well. Default is 0.25.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Sparkline (igSparkline widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.DataBinding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before data binding.
Return false in order to cancel data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.DataBound
member.summary:
Event which is raised after data binding.
Function takes first argument null and second argument ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.data to obtain reference to array actual data which is displayed by chart.
Use ui.dataSource to obtain reference to instance of $.ig.DataSource.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.UpdateTooltip
member.summary:
Event which is raised before tooltip is updated.
Return false in order to cancel updating and hide tooltip.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.text to obtain html of tooltip. Value of that member can be modified. If modified value is null or empty string, then current content of tooltip keeps old value.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to item. Value of that member can be modified or replaced by custom item.
Use ui.x to obtain left position of tooltip in pixels relative to widget. Value of that member can be modified.
Use ui.y to obtain top position of tooltip in pixels relative to widget. Value of that member can be modified.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery object which represents tooltip. Value of that member can be replaced by custom element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineClientEvents.HideTooltip
member.summary:
Event which is raised before tooltip is hidden.
Return false in order to cancel hiding and keep tooltip visible.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.owner to obtain reference to chart widget.
Use ui.item to obtain reference to item.
Use ui.element to obtain reference to jquery object which represents tooltip or value of ui.element from last updateTooltip event. Value of that member can be replaced by custom element.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.SparklineModel.FormatLabel
member.summary:
Sets or gets a function which takes an object that produces a formatted label for displaying in the chart.
Function should return string and it takes 1 parameter: original value of label.
Example:
"function(val) { return typeof val === 'number' && val < 0 ? '(' + (-val) + ')' : val; }"

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Validator (igValidator widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.CheckValue
member.summary:
Event which is raised on validation before default validation logic is applied.
Return false in order to consider value as invalid and to display error message with ui.message.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.value to get current value in target.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.Validation
member.summary:
Event which is raised after value was validated but before any action takes effect.
Return false to keep possible old/current error message unchanged, and possible new error message is not displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.
Use ui.invalid to get state, where true is invalid and false is valid.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorShowing
member.summary:
Event which is raised before error message is displayed.
Return false in order to prevent error message display.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorHiding
member.summary:
Event which is raised before error message is hidden.
Return false in order to keep error message displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorShown
member.summary:
Event which is raised after error message was displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorClientEvents.ErrorHidden
member.summary:
Event which is raised after error message was hidden.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.message to get text of message.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorAlignment
member.summary: Specifies the alignment of the error message relative to the target element of the Validator widget.

member.summary: Error message appears below target element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorAlignment.Left
member.summary: Error message appears on the left side of target element.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorAlignment.Right

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus
member.summary: Specifies the KeepFocus option of the Validator widget.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus.Always
member.summary: Validator attempts to set focus back to target control every time when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus.Once
member.summary: Validator attempts to set focus back to target control only once when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorKeepFocus.Never
member.summary: Validator does not set focus back to target control when validation fails.

member.summary: Error message used when validator did not find a proper conditional error message.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.Select
member.summary: Error message used when Required was set and target is select or checkbox or radio.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MinSelect
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength was set, target is select or checkboxes and validation for minimum number of selected items failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MaxSelect
member.summary: Error message used when MaxLength was set, target is select or checkboxes and validation for maximum number of selected items failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.RangeSelect
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength and MaxLength were set, target is select or checkboxes and validation for range of selected items failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MinLength
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength was set and validation for minimum length failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MaxLength
member.summary: Error message used when MaxLength was set and validation for maximum length failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.RangeLength
member.summary: Error message used when MinLength and MaxLength were set and validation for range failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.Required
member.summary: Error message used when Required was set and validation for not empty value failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.Range
member.summary: Error message used when MinValue and MaxValue were set and validation for range failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MinValue
member.summary: Error message used when MinValue was set and validation for minimum value failed.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorErrorMessageCondition.MaxValue
member.summary: Error message used when MaxValue was set and validation for maximum value failed.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel
member.summary: Class describing the options available for the Validator.

member.name: M:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.#ctor
member.summary: ValidatorModel constructor.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ID
member.summary: Sets the ID of the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MaxValue
member.summary: Sets the maximum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MinValue
member.summary: Sets the minimum value allowed in the target control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MaxLength
member.summary: Sets the maximum length of the string or the selected items allowed in the target control.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in the target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.MinLength
member.summary: Sets minimum length of string or selected items allowed in target control.

remarks.p: Maximum number of characters in target element if target allows to enter text (INPUT, TEXTAREA), or maximum number of selected items when target is SELECT-multiple or checkboxes with same name.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.AnimationShowDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds which shows error message.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.AnimationHideDuration
member.summary: Sets duration of animation in milliseconds which hides error message.

remarks.p: Default value is 300.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.Required
member.summary: Sets validation for not empty value in target control. Default value is false and validation is disabled.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ErrorMessage
member.summary: Sets the custom error message.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.RegExp
member.summary: Sets the javascript regular expression which method "test()" will be used for validation of value in control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ConditionalMessages
member.summary: Sets predefined conditional error messages.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.Alignment
member.summary: Sets the alignment of error message relative to target control. Default value is Bottom.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.KeepFocusOnError
member.summary: Sets option to keep focus in control when validation fails and control loses focus.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ShowIcon
member.summary: Sets option to show or hide error icon which is displayed inside of error label in front of error text.validation for not empty value in target control. True: show error icon, false: do not show error icon. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnBlur
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when control loses focus.

remarks.p: True: validate onblur event of browser, false: do not validate on blur. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnChange
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when value in control changes.

remarks.p: True: validate onchange, onkeydown, etc. events of browser, false: do not validate on change. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the onsubmit event is raised on client.

remarks.p: True: validate onsubmit event of browser, false: do not validate onsubmit. Default value is true.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.ValidateOnFormSubmit
member.summary: Sets option to triggers validation when the form.submit() method is called by application on client.

remarks.p: True: validate when form.submit() was called, false: do not validate form.submit(). Default value is false.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ValidatorModel.BodyAsParent
member.summary: Sets option to use the BODY or local-parent of target as the parent element for error message. Default value is true and the BODY is used.

member.summary: Wrapper for model.

member.summary: Names of client events exposed by Video Player (igVideoPlayer widget)

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Ended
member.summary:
Occurs when video has ended.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Playing
member.summary:
Occurs when video gets playing.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Paused
member.summary:
Occurs when video is paused.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Buffering
member.summary:
Occurs when a chunk of data is buffered.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.buffered to get buffered percentage.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Progress
member.summary:
Occurs when video has advanced the playback position.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.currentTime to get current position in the video at which the event was fired.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.Waiting
member.summary:
Occurs when igVideoPlayer is waiting for data from the server.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.currentTime to get current position in the video at which the event was fired.
Use ui.duration to get the video duration in seconds.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.BookmarkHit
member.summary:
Occurs when the bookmark is hit.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.
Use ui.bookmark to get the bookmark object from the bookmarks array.
Use ui.bookmarkElement to get the html element in the DOM.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.BookmarkClick
member.summary:
Occurs when the bookmark is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.bookmark to get the bookmark object from the bookmarks array.
Use ui.bookmarkElement to get the html element in the DOM.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.EnterFullScreen
member.summary:
Occurs when igVideoPlayer enters full screen mode.

Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.ExitFullScreen
member.summary:
Occurs when igVideoPlayer exits full screen mode.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.source to get the url of the playing video.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.RelatedVideoClick
member.summary:
Occurs when related video is clicked.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.relatedVideo to get the relatedVideo object from the relatedVideos array.
Use ui.relatedVideoElement to get the relatedVideo html element in the DOM.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerClientEvents.BannerVisible
member.summary:
Defines the name of the player banner visible event. Fired when the banner has been displayed.
Function takes arguments evt and ui.
Use ui.index to get the banner index in the banners array.
Use ui.banner to get the banner object from the banners array.
Use ui.bannerElement to get the banner html element in the DOM.

member.summary:

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel
member.summary: Model containing the options for the VideoPlayer widget.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.ID
member.summary: Set the ID of the div on which the VideoPlayer widget will be created.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.HtmlAttributes
member.summary: Sets custom attributes of the div on which the VideoPlayer widget will be created.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Sources
member.summary: Set a list of video sources to choose from. Best coded/format is automatically detected by this control. Supported types are depending on the browser and could be one of the following mov, mp4, webm, ogv.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Width
member.summary: Set the width of the control. By default null will stretch the control to fit data, if no other widths are defined.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Height
member.summary: Set the height of the control. By default null will stretch the control to fit data, if no other heights are defined.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.PosterUrl
member.summary: Set a URL to an image to show, when no video data is available.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Preload
member.summary: Set whether to preload load inital data for duration of video. If true it may start buffering the video, but this highly depends on the specific browser implementation.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Autoplay
member.summary: Set whether the video should start playing immediately after the control is loaded.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Autohide
member.summary: Set whether player controls will auto hide when video is not hovered. This is applicable only when Infragistics playback controls are used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.VolumeAutohideDelay
member.summary: Set volume slider auto hide delay. This is applicable only when Infragistics playback controls are used.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Loop
member.summary: Set whether the video to start again after it has ended.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.BrowserControls
member.summary: Set whether if you want to use the built in browser controls. By default player uses Infragistics playback controls. Note that you may have different look and feel accross different browsers if you use the built in browser controls.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Fullscreen
member.summary: Set whether the video player to be in full screen or not. This is not a pure full screen, because browsers do not allow that. It just sets 100% width and height to the control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Volume
member.summary: Set the video volume. It can be between 0.0 and 1.0.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Muted
member.summary: Set whether video volume is muted.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Title
member.summary: Set video title.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.ShowSeekTime
member.summary: Set whether the control seek tool tip will be shown when hovering the video progress bar.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.ProgressLabelFormat
member.summary: Sets the format of the video progress label. You should use ${currentTime} to represent current playback position and ${duration} to represent video duration.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.Bookmarks
member.summary: Set an array of bookmarks that will be displayed in the video player control.

member.name: P:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.VideoPlayerModel.RelatedVideos
member.summary: Set an array of related videos that will be displayed when video playback has ended.

member.summary: Set custom banners.

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents
member.summary: Names of client events exposed by igZoombar widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.ZoomChanging
member.summary: Event fired before a zoom action is applied. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.previousZoom.left to get the previous zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.previousZoom.width to get the previous zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.left to get the new zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.width to get the new zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.ZoomChanged
member.summary: Event fired after a zoom action is applied. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.previousZoom.left to get the previous zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.previousZoom.width to get the previous zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.left to get the new zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.newZoom.width to get the new zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragStarting
member.summary: Event fired when the user attempts to drag the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragStarted
member.summary: Event fired when the user starts dragging the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragging
member.summary: Event fired when the user drags the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragEnding
member.summary: Event fired when the user attemtps to stop dragging the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowDragEnded
member.summary: Event fired when the user stops dragging the zoom window. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowResizing
member.summary: Event fired when the user resizes the zoom window with the window's handles. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarClientEvents.WindowResized
member.summary: Event fired after the user resizes the zoom window with the window's handles. Function takes arguments evt and ui. Use ui.zoomWindow.left to get the current zoom window left position as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.zoomWindow.width to get the current zoom window width as a fraction of the absolute width of the target. Use ui.owner to get reference to igZoombar.

member.summary: The Zoombar will attach to the first widget from the supported ones it finds initialized on the target element

member.summary: Zoom actions supported by the Zoombar

member.summary: The zoom action is applied as the end-user interacts with the zoom window

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoomActionType.Deferred
member.summary: The zoom action is applied after the interaction with the zoom window completes

member.name: T:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarCloneConfig
member.summary: Automatic configuration types for the cloned widget

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarCloneConfig.Auto
member.summary: Options for initializing the clone will be inferred from the target widget. Certain properties will be altered to make the clone more suitable for using inside the Zoombar

member.name: F:Infragistics.Web.Mvc.ZoombarCloneConfig.None
member.summary: No clone of the target widget will be initialized inside the Zoombar.
